name: Richard Foster
text:
Sorry, this is a rather long comment. First, on a positive note. The store looks great and it's great to have a good hardware store so close. Also, the personnel were knowledgeable which usually is why I prefer stores like this over Big box retailers.

So I've had a day to consider my experience at this store. I was excited to have a reason to go to the new Ace store not too far from me. It didn't go well. And for perspective, I almost never strongly complain. But, to start, I'm exceptionally busy and need a place that is easy for transactions and returns. So, being busy, I went to the shed and found out I didn't have the key for the pad lock. I ran to Ace and picked up a small bolt cutter. Coming home, I tried twice on the lock and realized it was too small.

Returning to the store, I tried to return the item within 30 minutes of purchase (with receipt) to buy a large Bolt cutter. This is when I found out about the 'no return' for used items policy. OK, I can accept that. I won't be able to shop there. But I accept that. The problem? From my perspective, the owner was rude. 'No, we won't take that back. It's used' he said. IMO, 'I'm sorry, we're an independent franchise and we can't afford to take back used items' would have been a much better response.

One other story. Last year, I bought a push mower at Lowes. I tried it and it wasn't sufficient. I took it back and got a more powerful mower. They took it back no questions asked. Had I bought it at this Ace? Nope, no returns on used items. I could be wrong but I also assume you can't  bring back defectives items (it's under warranty so deal with the manufacturer?) I could be wrong there. But again, with all that's on my plate, I need easy returns. With all that said, I wish this store well. We need you here.

name: Debbie Reeves
text: As of this writing (late August 2021), the store is a brand new store. They just opened a few weeks ago. Being a new store, everything is squeaky clean and everything is on place. The ladies there were super nice and helpful. I would go back again because they are convenient to go to and have good selections of hardware.

name: Allison McCormick
text: So happy to have this new location open so close to home. The store was very clean and the associates were very helpful.

name: James White
text: So nice to have a hardware store here in the Harvest and Tony area. The store is stock full of essential and the staff's are super friendly.

name: Maryann Hockman
text:
Glad to give 5 stars. Will return for more shopping in the future.
Manager helped me with three items and my son with 2. Very willing to help and answer questions for us as we went along.
Sale just under $50.00, Very nice to have the story in our Toney, Alabama area.
Thank you!
MaryAnn

text: I had a great experience at DSDW! The sales associate was professional, knowledgeable, helpful, & kind. I saved hundreds if not thousands on light fixtures for my entire home. They had a beautiful selection & many varieties. The store was very busy with customers but the female sales associate spent individual time with me & helped me with my selection. I will be going back very soon!

text: Just left this place and was not greeted at all. The people in the store saw me walk in and never even paused their conversation. I was in the store for several minutes and not once did any one ask if I needed assistance. I think it was a customer and employee but a simple "Hey I will be with you" wrap up your conversation about Land Rovers and help the next person.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing the details of your recent experience with us and we truly apologize for the lack of customer service you received at our store. Providing exceptional service to all of our customers is a priority and this issue is very concerning to us. We'd like to discuss the situation with you and put you in touch with the appropriate Sherwin-Williams contact who can assist. Please contact us at 1-800-4Sherwin (474-3794) or by email at https://www.sherwin-williams.com/homeowners/contact-us/feedback. Please include your store location, if applicable, when contacting us. Sincerely, T.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

text: The staff was very knowledgeable and helpful. Even for my small project of painting an accent wall in my office.

name: Jennifer McEuen
text: Can’t say enough good things about the staff! Sydney and Parker have been so helpful in choosing colors for our new construction home. I would describe where a color would be used, materials around it, and Sydney’s suggestion was what I liked best every time! Even during the Covid 19 crisis their curbside service is outstanding and I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you for recommending your local Sherwin-Williams store! Sincerely, T.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

text: The guy at the counter didnt listen to anything we told him.  Even after telling him 4 or 5 times.  We knew exactly what we wanted, and how much we wanted.  He insisted on giving us and telling us what he wanted.  I can see how this would be appreciated if we were clueless and asking questions but that wasn't the case.

resp.text: Thank you for recommending your local Sherwin-Williams store and we're glad that you're pleased with the service you received and the quality of our products. However, we're sorry you feel our pricing is not in line with the industry. We do offer many sales and promotions throughout the year. In addition, if you sign up for our PaintPerks program you will receive a $10 off of $50 coupon, everyday discounts on paints, stains and supplies and exclusive sales and emails. For more information on this program, please visit www.mysw.com. We thank you for sharing this feedback with us. If you have any additional questions, please give us a call at 1-800-4Sherwin (474-3794) or email us at https://www.sherwin-williams.com/homeowners/contact-us/feedback. Sincerely, T.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

text: Very nice show room. Ask for Kara!

name: Pam McCann
text:
I would not recommend this company for anything. I order the product and they sent me a email saying  my item was back ordered because it was a popular brand. When I contacted them to cancel it they sent me a email saying that I received my order when I didn’t. People please take you business elsewhere.
Pam .

name: Craig Ruvere
text: I ordered a travertine fireplace hearth from them. Paid $700 for it. Shipped perfectly but when I got it in the house and went to lay it on the floor is literally snapped in half and damaged my wood floor! Fighting with them now to try and get some compensation but already feeling as though my issue is unimportant to them as I sit around waiting for a response. I was going to order a mantel from them as well...this has certainly changed my mind. Hoping for a positive resolution.

name: Christy Nichole Goodman
text: I have put in an application there, I hoping to go to work for them!

name: Cherilyn “Cheri” Curths
text: I just got my free standing electric fireplace the wood has little holes all over it. I canot believe a company would send this out like this .trying to get a call back $799.00 is a lot to pay for damaged goods. Cherilyn Curths email Momcat1954@hotmail.com

name: Tammy Ritchie
text: I ordered a curved insert off Lowe's website and got a flat screen instead. I had to pay $85 to send it back. Total rip off never used it. I ordered because I trusted Lowe's. I can't believe that they do business with this shady company called renovations brands.

resp.text: I believe that you may have associated us with someone else. We do not sell the product type you have described on Lowes.

name: Matthew Woodbury
text: They will not help you out if you need it .   They will drag things out and then tell you that you are past the point that they can help you.  As a business owner i can not believe this is the way they treat their customers.

name: Melanie Williams
text: I had a positive experience prior so hired Kevin again. I tried to reach him to make things right and could not reach him via phone or text. My flooring was cut incorrectly. I have numerous spots where you can see the slab. Toilets were not correctly re-installed. House was left a total mess. Floors were filthy, grout and sand and debris left in my sinks and tubs. Trim was not replaced where it belonged. Hole was made in my bedroom wall, was repaired, not great. I felt I was taken advantage of regarding charges to remove subfloor. I questioned the high rate and was told it was because it could take days, it took hours yet I wasn’t offered any relief.

name: Alex
text: Kevin is prompt and very professional. He arrived on time and notified me in advance when he would be here and what he would be doing. He tore out my old plastic master shower and tiled in a beautiful new one for me. The only negative is my water bill is going to go up because I love my shower now.10/10 highly recommended for tile in shower work.

name: Meredith Zywno
text: Kevin and his team recently replaced some laminate flooring in two rooms of our house with hardwoods. Kevin arrived on time and got the job done well within the expected timeline. He and his team were extremely courteous and professional, and his office manager was very easy to work with. We are very happy with how our floors turned out and will definitely be calling WCR in the future.

resp.text: Meredith, thank you so much for your positive review!

name: Dra Coleman
text: The quality of work is very poor.  The quality of work could have been mitigated if problems  we're shared with the owner when discovered.  You  can not suggest or make comments unless you pay for his and son mistakes.  This guy does not listen and have an answer for everything.  I would not recommend this company to anyone else.  I am having to hire someone else to correct his errors with the wood floors installed.

text: Kevin and his crew work hard to provide quality service in a polite, professional manner. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Larry, thank you for your kind words! It was a pleasure working with you.

text: Kevin and his crew did an excellent job remodeling our bathtub into a walk in shower. He was kind enough, and patient enough, to work around our crazy hours and scheduling to get the job done. Only one little hiccup with the plumbing but he just called in another plumber and was back on track in no time! Job well done gentlemen!

resp.text: Thank you Caryn for your kind words! It makes us happy that you are pleased with our work.

name: Morgan Posey
text: Hannah was great from the beginning helping us pick out everything and Becky came and measured and installation went great! Then our new house flooded 😩 the whole team was amazing through that experience. They came out that same day and uninstalled all the counter tops in the rooms that were affected so that the cabinets and flooring could be removed and were so quick to get us back on the schedule for reinstall once everything was fixed. Becky is the best and has been SUPER helpful the entire time! You can’t beat the quality or service with them. Hands down will use them again with any granite needs we have in the future! We LOVE all of our countertops and sinks!

text: The owner and employees at Sherer Granite go out of their way to make you happy!  First, we  had a personal visit to our home to help us make all the right decisions and to measure everything and were given assistance with color schemes. For us, in the future there is no other granite store other than Granite South!

name: Dorothy Jensen
text: Ray and Abe did a wonderful job installing drapery panels and plantation shutters.  This is our third purchase from Budget Blinds, and every time we have appreciated the professional and friendly service.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words and continued business. We really appreciate it!

name: Mike Lovell
text: We are new to the area and updating our home here in Gulf Shores. We had 4 sets of French doors that had older drapes that were past their prime. We called this company and Alex came to our home. His professionalism and knowledge of the products was very impressive. We came to an agreement on product and price which was more than fair in my opinion. Alex ordered our new shades which were all odd sizes and had to be custom cut. Our installer, Abe came out as soon as they came in and did a great job taking the old drapes down and installing our shades. This is a first class company, and I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review and choosing us for your window treatments in your home!

name: Robert Bois
text: We decided on Plantation Shutters for our new construction home in Foley. We went with Budget Blinds primarily because of their very good reputation and the fact that their salesman, Alex, was so knowledgeable and he was able to guide us through many decisions we needed to make to get the end product we thought we were looking for. Naturally we had to wait a few weeks as each of our blinds needed to be custom made. However, in the mean time, Alex installed temporary blinds in our home that worked wonderfully and held us over till the day of install. The install was done by Abe and Cameron and simply put, I don't think we could have asked for anyone better in terms of skill, professionalism, and personality.  BOTTOM LINE: We simply could not be happier with the quality of the product, the install, and the LOOKS! Thank you ever most kindly Budget Blinds!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review! We love the great team that we have and appreciate hearing your kind words. It was a pleasure installing your window treatments.

name: Dottie Lee
text: We love our new plantation shutters from Budget Blinds.The customer service from them is awesome.From our great salesman Alex to our great installers Abe and Dennis. They treat you like family and are so attentive to detail. Five stars!

resp.text: We are so happy you love your new shutters! Thank you for choosing us for your window treatments.

name: Peggy Barton
text: We had living room blinds installed by Phil and Cam.  They were awesome.  They worked hard, were very polite, punctual, and very efficient.  They both wore masks, took their shoes off on the carpet, and cleaned up afterwards.  They did an amazing job!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Mary Bynum
text:
Thanks to Budget Blinds of Baldwin County for installing all of our home window treatments! Absolutely first class service from ALL team members!
Dennis, Ray, Austin, Phil, truly represent th a " A" team !!! We highly recommend them, Harry & Frances B.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We hope you have a great weekend.

name: Paula Rigsby
text: This is the second time we have used Budget Blinds.  Phil was great to work with and gave me great ideas.  The installers were here yesterday and installed shutters and shades.  They were very professional, efficient and respectful.  I highly recommend Phil and Budget Blinds!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mrs. Rigsby!

name: Sheri Hines
text: Phil was amazing! Helped us select the perfect blinds for our master bedroom with four giant windows and french doors. The finished look is beautiful and just what we wanted. The process was easy from requesting an inital visit through to installaion. Phil is friendly, courteous, communicative, timely, and most of all a joy to work with. I fully receommend Budget Blinds of Baldwin County.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Lundy Wilder
text:
Ask for Alex ! The others at Budget Blinds may be great also but I KNOW that Alex is !  I finally had my home-made goofy shades in my bedroom replaced with beautiful sleek roller shades. Alex was great at helping me find some that blocked most of the hot summer sun but allowed me to see the trees and what was going on outside. The color is a perfect match for my walls and it turned out to be the less costly line they carry, which was a bonus.
Alex is punctual and returns calls and took my old plastic straw shades off to put in their recycle bin and he removed all packaging when he left.
He has a great attitude and is a pleasure to be around. Great experience all around.

name: Lindsay Pileggi
text: Budget Blinds is the best!  I was contacted within a day of submitting a Request Online through their website.  They set up an appointment with a Consultant to meet at my house.  The Consultant Phillip was on time, friendly, professional, and very knowledgeable.  He was able to go through the various options of Blinds available for purchase, and gave me comparisons on pricing and quality of each selection.  Working with Budget Blinds was the best experience.  And the best part, Pricing was not outrageous!  Why try to hunt someone down at your local hardware store?  Call Budget Blinds and let them come to you.  It's so easy!  I will be contacting them again when I'm ready to get blinds for my sun room.

name: Sandy Bookout
text:
We have used Budget Blinds in Birmingham several times. So, when we moved to Gulf Shores I went in search of a Budget Blinds close by. And there they were! We have used them twice here and both times have had a wonderful experience. They are easy to schedule an appointment with and they always show up on time. The sales reps are knowledgeable  and very easy to work with. On the day of the install it was pouring down rain. They came to my door, took off their shoes, and got right to work. Wonderful team! Wonderful product. Thanks!
Sandy B.

name: Sean Ferrell
text: We have used Budget Blinds multiple times. We love the woven shades in our home so much, we decided to use their products again in our office! Val has awesome knowledge of their products, and recommended a perfect treatment for our windows in our budget! Their customer service and installation team go above and beyond with their kindness and professionalism. We will definitely use them again!

name: Jane Breaux
text: Highly recommend BB for all your window covering needs! I really enjoyed working with highly competent design specialist Phil Duke who was able to help me select the PERFECT style of drapes and blinds without breaking my budget, and perfect installation of them too! They took plenty of time with me, no high pressure sales, and let me decide what was best for the space! I look forward to working with Phil and BB again in the future for more great blinds!

name: Chi EK
text: Very professional and competent at their job. Our blinds were hung with the utmost care and concern. We even received hands on review on how to take care of them, removal and putting back if and when necessary. Thank you for a job well done. We would use them again.

name: Rick Johnson
text: Shopped quite a bit looking for professionalism, price, and quality.  Look no further.  Budget Blinds has a superior product and team.  Alex consulted us on the right blinds and shutters, and personally installed them.  They not only look great, they really set the look of the house off.  Hats off to Alex and the whole Budget Blind Staff!

name: Anya Babb
text: We used them twice. The first time everything was perfect. On our second home the shutters were horrible they used a bunch of caulking that cracked and let a lot of light through. Paid nearly 6 grand and regret it.

text: Genesis renovations did our master bathroom (new tile shower, new flooring) and we are so happy we chose them. Because of an unforeseen electrical issue, our project took longer than expected, but we were contacted and updated every step of the way. I recommend them to everyone, and I will give them a call for my next project!

name: Ann Titus
text: I want to give a big Shout Out! And Thank You! To Brandon Granger and John with Genesis Renovations for my beautiful bathroom!  They have been very easy to work with, show up when they say, communicate well and often and were spot on with their estimate!  Brandon and John are meticulous with their work as are their sub-contractors: Charlie the plumber and the tile guy.  From start to finish it only took a week!  Also want to thank Charlene Rumsey with Henry Tile for her patience and help in choosing the perfect tile. So if you need anything done at your house I would definitely recommend Genesis Renovations!

text: An Excellent and professional group of people to work with. Great quality of workmanship. GENESIS RENOVATIONS are now our go to people.

name: Carlos Puig-Garcia
text: Brandon came out to my house on Feb 2nd to give me a quote to repair a leaky window. He quoted me $50 which I thought was a great price. We agreed for the work to be done the following Tuesday on the 6th. Tuesday comes and no one shows up and no phone calls. I called repeatedly and never received an answer or return call.  I will be happy to change this review upon a suitable explanation but the lack of professionalism is disappointing as he did not come across that way at all.

resp.text: Mr. Puig-Garcia, we do apologize for this. We just became aware of this review recently and wanted to respond. This is certainly and unacceptable occurance and not normal for our business. While we aren't sure what was happening at that time, we do apologize. If you would, please give us a call and let us know what we can do to make this right. Thank you.

text:
These guys saved us, big time.
Wade, Kevin and Steph were an awesome team and did a phenomenal job installing our glass shower surround.
We originally hired another company to do this, and they wrecked it. Wasted money and damaged our new tile, but Madison Glass got us fixed up and it looks perfect. Super reasonably priced and professional. They deserve 10 stars! Thank you guys so much!

resp.text: You are very welcome Sidney!! We truly hate to hear what all you went through before finding us. You are absolutely correct when you say they were an awesome team.

name: Katrina Hutchins
text: Called to ask about a quote, $80 before any measuring done and at least 2 weeks before coming out to do the quote.... but when the girl on the phone heard that I’d have to call her back without hearing why, she hangs up in my ear!!😡 I’m definitely not calling back now!

resp.text:
Katrina, we have a large area of North Alabama where we provide free estimates at absolutely no cost to the customer.  It includes 72 different zip code areas and most of the metropolitan areas. Unfortunately your home is in Gurley which is not included in the free estimate area.

Our typical time to get out to jobs for estimates has historically been one or two days maximum.  It’s a source of pride for us.  But during Covid many people have chosen to stay home and upgrade their homes.  Unfortunately, like all businesses that specialize in home remodeling, we have a backlog of several weeks of work.  We have been working overtime to get our lead times back to normal and are making headway in catching up.

We offer our sincere apology for any inconvenience this has caused.  We feel it’s more important to be honest and upfront about the current backlog than to promise quicker lead times and then fail to deliver on them.

We have had problems with our VOIP phone system all day, experiencing several dropped calls. Again, we apologize if this has caused any of our customers to feel anything less than important.

name: Sherri Schrimsher
text: We (Alabama Cabinets) uses Madison Glass weekly to fill our glass needs.  Every time I call Ciera or Stephanie are always quick to answer the phone with a smile and go above and beyond for us.  We appreciate how quick their turn around time is and love the customer service that the girls in the office provide.  Keep up the great work Madison Glass!!!

resp.text: It is such a pleasure to hear from our repeat customers. We are very fortunate to have Stephanie and Ciara as part of our team; they take customer service seriously. Looking forward to our continued partnership!!

name: Keegan Benson
text: Decided to turn my garage into a home gym and thought to call these guys to figure out how much a mirror would cost. I'm definitely glad I did! It was not only cheaper than I expected, but the installation and advice that I received from Wade and Kevin were phenomenal bringing up points I'd never even considered. It was easy, pain free, and the mirror looks awesome!

resp.text: We are glad we were able to help you complete your project. We love it when a plan comes together!

name: Willie Allemeier
text: Definitely recommend for any/all glass work!  Searched the internet for a glass shop and stopped in, Stephanie and Ciara were great!  I was looking for a place to cut a piece of glass to put in a retirement shadow box.  They measured out everything and then asked to keep the shadow box to make sure everything fit just right.  Rob took it upon himself to cut the glass, ensured just the right fit, and even paid the bill!  Greatly appreciated Rob!

resp.text: Willie, we are so glad you found us! We have a wonderful group of people on our team and it's great to hear they were able to take care of your needs. We look forward to being there for you again!

text: Could not ask for better service, from Christy at the office to Keith and Devin who repaired the window. We had a window broken from a soccer ball and Madison Glass did a great job on the repair! They were quick and professional. Will definitely use Madison Glass again should we have any window issues.

resp.text: Shanna, we understand the frustration of the unexpected. We are so glad that Christy was able to get Keith and Devin out to get that repair completed for you. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you !!

text: I'm a furniture refinisher and had a beautiful antique vanity with a broken center mirror.  The 2 ladies up front, Stephanie and Ciara (hope I spelled that correctly) walked me through everything, advised me on the best thickness and the differences. Very professional, very fast and I know have a complete vanity to paint! All my glass/mirror needs will be done there.

resp.text: You are very welcome Guy. It was definitely our pleasure to serve you!

name: Casey G
text:
We had a great experience with Madison Glass Company.

We recently replaced the builder grade shower in our master bathroom with a new tile shower. After the tiling was complete, I reached out to five different companies in the area to come give me quotes on a glass shower door and surround as well as an interior window pane for an insulated double pane window that one of kids had managed to crack.

Out of all five companies that came out, I felt like Wade and Kevin from Madison glass were the only ones that tried to assess the job and recommend the best solution for us. They were the only one of the five companies that realized there was not a stud behind the tile where the door was to be installed and actually recommended a solution that ended up saving us money (though they also made sure I knew they were capable of going with the more expensive solution if we decided to go that route).

Using the information that they provided, I was able to go back and get a slightly cheaper quote from one of the other companies. Despite that, I went with Madison Glass because I felt I could trust Wade and Kevin to do the job right. I'm glad I did.

We had a small hiccup with the manufacturer on the first replacement window and shower door that came in, but Wade and Kevin set us up for the mean time and made sure to prioritize getting back out as soon as the replacement glass came in.

The shower looks great, the service was excellent, they let us know what to expect and then kept us informed throughout the process, and we ended up spending less than what we expected. I have already recommended them to a friend and will certainly use them in the future.

resp.text: We understand that it is difficult to find honest, dependable help. As a company, we want integrity to be the norm, not the exception. With custom installations, there are bound to be a few bumps in the road, but it's the way people handle those bumps that truly matter. I'm glad we were able to come through for you!

name: Nicola Duncombe
text: My shower door had broken after 14 years. I checked around for prices and Madison Glass had the best price. I ended up going with them to have my shower door replaced last week.  I found them to be very friendly, responsive, and professional!  Wade and Kevin were skilled and courteous. They did an awesome job, and loved how they explained things to me that I wasn't aware of! I highly recommend Madison Glass, and will use them in the future.

resp.text: We are so glad to have been able to help you Nicola. Thank you for letting us know about your overall experience. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We would be happy to help you again in the future!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to share your recommendation! We’re glad to hear you had a good experience. Sincerely, A.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

name: Maryam Syed
text: Disappointed by the customer service here. The employees are there to help customers, not belittle or make anyone feel less knowledgeable. Clearly we aren’t all paint experts so it’s expected that the employees at Sherwin Williams would help you find what you are looking for. Shame on them. Make sure you help every customer with the same respect. Luckily, there are many other places to get paint from.

resp.text: Hi Maryam, Thank you for sharing the details of your recent experience with us and we truly apologize for the lack of customer service you received at our store. Providing exceptional service to all of our customers is a priority and this issue is very concerning to us. We'd like to discuss the situation with you and put you in touch with the appropriate contact who can assist. Please contact us at 1-800-4Sherwin (474-3794) or by email at bit.ly/2Dgu0Ti Please include your store location, if applicable, when contacting us. Sincerely, T.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

name: Bethney Prestage
text: Gave 3 stars because not all the employees are rude like one in particular. I just stopped by to drop off a swatch to have matched and mixed, was going to come back later and pick it up. I was told when I walked in the door that I was unable to be helped and would have to come back in 30 minutes. What kind of store denies its customer service? Let's just say we do our best to use a different location whenever possible.

resp.text: Hi Bethney, We're sorry to hear about your unpleasant experience at our store. We'd like to discuss the situation with you and put you in touch with the appropriate Sherwin-Williams contact who can assist. Please contact us at 1-800-4Sherwin (474-3794) or by email at https://www.sherwin-williams.com/homeowners/contact-us/feedback. Please include the store location, if applicable, when contacting us. Sincerely, T.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

text: I cannot recall his name, but a young Hispanic Gentleman helped me buy paint from the store and had a great attitude the entire time when I decided to get more paint I contacted him and he called the store to get it ready for me even though he was not working at that time I appreciate all the help and think that this man will do great things for this company!

text:
(Translated by Google) It's a good place

(Original)
Es un buen lugar

name: charlie engel
text: I paid half the money the day I agreed and the remainder was due after installation.  The salesman said it will 6 to 8 week before we can get to it. Three days later they call and got an opening. That was my first red flag. Three guys showed up, the oldest about 20. Second red flag. When it rained I had Niagara falls. A second crew showed up and replaced 95% and added downspouts. They used white screws on brown gutters.  When they spray painted then, they got brown paint all over the soffit.  Bad company!!!!

name: Lashawna Springer
text: 3 different individuals came to my home to give us an inspection and quote. Each time we were told they would bring us a free $25 gift card for our time. When the third individual came, he informed me that they don’t issue the gift cards stating they come from home office! He also wanted me to make a decision today. They quoted me $13,000 which is crazy!!!

name: Charlene Graham
text: I would give a zero if I could. The sales representative that came to our house on 10/10/20 was very rude and pushy to say the least. We made it clear we were getting an estimate ONLY. After he finally gave us the estimate he was insistent that he start the job that day. When we told him we would have to discuss things together he very rudely said “what’s there to discuss?”  That happened several times. He even asked how much did we have to spend on it! He kept loudly saying “I’m ready to start today”. We had trouble getting him to leave as we told him we had things to do. He finally left and sat in his car for a while and then came back to the door. My husband told him he had errands to run. He got back in his car for a while and when my husband was trying to leave he got out of his car and followed him to his pick up insisting on further conversation. My husband had to MAKE him leave! We wouldn’t use this business if it were the only one in existence!! Charlene Graham

name: Dunahwa Wohali
text: Ultimate Gutter Guard completed our window installation in a timely and professional manner.  The new windows added to the appearance of our home.  Gutter Guard management stayed in touch with us during the installation and demonstrated they wanted our experience with them to be a pleasant one.  I highly recommend them.

name: Larry Allen
text: Great gutter system. We had them install vinyl siding, replace wood rot, and cover exposed wood on the entire house. Great team. Professional job! Fair price.

name: Allison Berry
text: We has an over all great experience with them. The salesman was friendly and courteous, as were the men who installed our gutters. The men were quick, efficient  and did a wonderful job and took the care to be quieter around my baby's nursery while she was sleeping. Great customer service and I would use them again!

name: Brian Luna
text: The work was top quality. We are very happy with the new vinyl and gutters. It has made a huge difference in the look of our home and has helped tremendously with some drainage problems we were experiencing. Highly recommended.

name: M Dupree
text: Needs some improvement. The in home quote process is extremely too long. Shouldn’t take 2 hours to get a price. The installers arrived after lunchtime and were finishing up when it was getting dark.  Bottom part of downspouts are just slid on and not attached. Come off during heavy downpours.  Downspout installed almost directly over a sprinkler head. Installers had not installed one of the downspouts until I questioned it.

name: Dave Covington
text: This product is amazing. We have had ours for several months now and we are very happy with them. Our lot has many large Oak trees so cleaning the gutters has always been a big hassle. Now the leaves just go right over the edge with no problems. I recommend you consider these for your home, especially if you don't want to clean gutters again. The crew was very professional and courteous, and they cleaned up and removed all the old gutters.

name: Rodney Murray
text:
Well let’s just first off I was called 14 times over the weekend to confirm the 5 P.M. appointment for today Monday October 14th.
Well the time came and passed without anyone showing up or anyone calling. Needless to say we will be using a different company and hopefully one that can at least keep an appointment.
I can’t imagine if they had been installed and we had a problem. I’m thinking if they would ditch a paying customer they would surely not be eager to fix a problem.

name: Jessie YOUNG
text: The experience with our salesman, the Office Manager (Beth), and our installers was very satisfactory.  Beth addressed an issue I had and the installers took the necessary time to do a great job.

name: The Davis Kids
text: Do not use!! It has been a horrible experience. We had gutters installed in February it is now September and gutters are still not working properly. Called multiple times with problems and was rescheduled 4 different times. I am paying 300 dollars a month with nothing to show for it. They finally came back out 2 weeks ago and still not working properly. This has been a totally horrible experience and I hope no one else makes this mistake.

name: Theresa Copeland
text: After purchasing my home in Jan 2017 one of the first updates was to replace/add new gutters all around. I did some research and was pleased to have selected HSV Gutter Guard. The entire experience was very positive from meeting the sale rep, to reviewing changes with the office manager, then having questions and concerns addressed by the installation team. The follow up calls I received from staff in GA were excellent as I had a small issue come up during an extended period of rain we had; the problem was fixed promptly and to my complete satisfaction. I have been very pleased working with this company and feel this was a good investment for my home.

name: Elizabeth Jackson
text: If I could give 0 Stars I would. They showed up late in an unmarked vehicle. They broke moulding around my windows and caulked it to fix. They left screws in my driveway.  Broke pictures on my walls. Spilled water on my I pad. Stood on my daughter's bed with dirty shoes. Did not encase the windows on the outside as agreed upon. We have gaps around the outside of the windows. If it rains it will rain in our walls.  I have original 1960s flashing still on my new windows. They caulked 2 inch gaps around the windows instead of getting correctly fitting windows. Then they took the final payment without authorization. We had contacted them multiple times to let them know that we were not satisfied and needed some things fixed that they broke., instead of contacting us they illegally charged my credit card, without signature. Now they are completely avoiding us and I'm having to take up credit card fraud because the last payment was not authorized. Nothing has been made right and no one will call us back. This company is completely unprofessional and I would not recommend to my enemy.

name: Sherrill Altice
text: Gutter Guard is a First Class Company! From the first phone call to schedule the appointment, to the installation process of the custom Bow window and 3 additional vinyl windows, Gutter Guard's Staff is to be commended for their friendliness and professionalism. Sales Representative, Chris and Factory Representative, Adam, were both EXCELLENT to work with. They ran a few quotes for our windows with various options for us to be able to compare and reach our decision. Thank you so much for making the shopping experience a pleasure!! Their installer, Jeff and his team, were AMAZING. They arrived in a timely manner and were extremely polite and friendly. Thank you for GREAT team work!! We are extremely satisfied. With Many Thanks, Dennis & Sherrill Altice

name: Debbie Brewer
text: My experience with Ultimate Gutter Guard was positive, in that installation was professional and was completed on time.  Since I have had the gutters installed, there have been no problems with drainage.  I have lots of trees on my property and these gutters have saved me from having them cleaned again and again.

name: V Bevill
text: Terrible experience!  My husband had heard the Gutter Guard gutters were excellent, and we also wanted vinyl/aluminum covering for the soffits and door frames. After a high pressure sales pitch, he agreed to the premium price, convincing himself that "you get what you pay for". Unfortunately, this was "too good to be true". Ultimate Gutter Guard did not deliver the trained, professional, and efficient service they promised. The job was scheduled for 3-4 days and it took 10 days to complete, with the production manager finishing the gutter work himself. Workers arrived late or not at all and our yard was a disaster. There was minor damage to the grass and landscaping and the final cleanup was not as thorough as we had been promised.  We had to supervise the work, call the company with numerous concerns and point out installation discrepancies in an attempt to get what we were sold. We were repeatedly given false/conflicting statements by the salesman, general manger, production manager and workman. At our insistence, they agreed to give us a small discount to avoid a complaint with the BBB. We won't be filing a formal complaint, but we would never recommend Ultimate Gutter Guard of Huntsville

name: Liz Moulder
text: We had new gutters installed earlier this year...after several months and lots of leaves, we're very happy with the effectiveness of our new system.  We also really appreciated the professional (and quick!) installation process.  Highly recommend!

name: Trent GILBERT
text: My recent installation of the Gutter Guard System was outstanding.  The work was done on time by a very professional crew.  The product has exceeded expectations and I highly recommend the product to any home owner that wants to protect their investment.

name: Matthew Gann
text:
Terrible experience.  We had sales team come in, deliver their promises of quality.  The installation team took months to finally get around to our house.  The product itself seemed okay, but the installation team took 2 weeks to do a job scheduled for a few days.  They mentioned looking in Garage windows and in an outside storage area.  The installation was sloppy, and when I complained about some of the issues they started to push back, saying they'd spent so long on the job that they needed to get it signed off to get paid.  A few months later a piece was falling off, and I called.  They sent someone out to "fix it", but I think they just reattached it to the fascia board that should have been replaced on the initial installation.  Now that section is falling again, and I'm having to go through the hassle of getting them to repair the work I paid a premium price for.  I will never use their services again.

EDIT:  After multiple issues that they have come out and "fixed" now they won't return calls, and our soffit has starting falling off of the front of our house now.  The service department will not answer their phones and never return calls.

name: Mike Johnston
text: We ended up not going with Gutter Guard but it’s not because of the product.  I really hate a long sales pitch and a pressure to sign.  “The moment I leave the price goes up and you lose all the discounts I just promised you.”  I personally don’t care about the founder and how great everyone else says they are.  I can do my own research if I want to know that kind of stuff.  For the price  they sell their product for (2/3 more than anyone else) you shouldn’t need the pitch.  All the best work I’ve ever had done has come word of mouth.  I avoided this company on that alone.  Champion Is exactly the same way too.

name: Alese West
text: Gutter guard  gave our home a new look, and the service was great even down to the financing. we give them a two thumb up. Love it

name: Carla Holder
text: A representative at Sam's Club set up an appointment for the next day.  The gentleman who showed up didn't know insulation so he said that someone else in installation would need to be brought in.  Four days later I was called and they set up an appointment for an insulation installation specialist.  He was a no-show.  I called in and was told that my husband needed to be there.  Their rep at Sam's Club had never mentioned that so I asked to speak to a manager.  The manager rescheduled for the next day.  They were a no-show the second day.  I called in and explained that I was the decision maker, so they scheduled to come out the next day.  They were a no-show the third day.  When I called in, the rep I talked to had inaccurate notes, saying I had cancelled.  She then hung up on me.  Don't use these folks, they like to strong arm people.

name: Amanda Borders
text: We never even think about our gutters now. They work great, and we haven't had any issues. Installers were professional and fast.

name: Diana Thacker
text: Love our gutters! My husband hates to get up on the ladder to clean out our old ones so these are great! Keeps out the leaves from our trees and we no longer have to worry! They look great!

name: Mary Mcclendon
text: Gutter Guard rep stop by residence whili in neighborhood.  Now we have protection from down pouring water. We really needed gutters.  Everything went smoothly from the first contact.

name: Tamara Statham
text: My husband and I are working professionals. Because of this we divide and conquer on household tasks. My husband, in charge of the gutter fix, called this company to set an appointment and get a quote. However, when he made the appointment, they said we both had to be there. This would mean we would both have to take time off work, which is very straining on us, just to get a quote. My husband and I had already agreed on what we wanted and needed. We both didn't need to be there. However, even after my husband explained our situation, they still REFUSED service. Needless to say, we are taking are business elsewhere and saving our Personal Time at work....

name: Jack Parker
text: I give them zero stars, but you had to give a star rating before you could post.  I am not satisfied at all with my gutters and efforts to get them to repair the problems have been futile.

name: James Block
text: Our new gutter guard gutters look fantastic! And no more searching for someone to clean out our gutters. Great value and perform as promised.

name: jackie irving
text: My husband and I found the services of Gutter Guard to be very professional. We bought 4 sets of windows and they were installed perfectly, and to our satisfaction. We were greatly pleased with their services.

name: Margaret Cloyd
text: I love my new gutters! I used to dread a rainy forecast. Now it doesn’t enter my mind! Great product!

name: Regina Cole
text: Gutter guard is the best gutters ever, 100% satisfied, I don't have to worry about my husband getting on the roof anymore !!

name: Ashley Turner
text: Great installation and super professional employees! No problems and very courteous customer service!

name: bradley chupp
text: Set up an appointment for an estimate for a roof replacement. Did not show up at the set time. No call after they said they would. Gave them a second chance and they were a no show. Called the office and was told they were 3 months behide on roofs and wern't giving any more estimates. This was after a few calls to get the estimate set up. VERY DISAPOINTED!

name: donna aiken
text: Company was on time, courteous, excellent workmanship, and exceptional clean up!

name: Judy Mills
text: Great job gutters look wonderful we love the no maintenance aspect

name: Ben Young
text: Receptionist called to scedule an estimate, and interrupted me multiple times.  Would not scedule an estimate unless both me amd my wife were present.   Struck me as a very unprofessional and shady company.

name: Jessica Hale
text: Fantastic Job  and Fast Service - Shower Looks GREAT!

name: Chris Williams
text: I was very happy with our Gutters. I would recommend them to anyone.

name: Floyd Adams
text: Wasn't there.

name: Steve Merry
text: Installers were very professional.  Gutters work well.

name: Rufus Ingram

name: Kay Horton

name: Elite Car Audio
text: Fantastic service. Quoted me an extremely good price on a gun that every other gun store couldn't even touch! Over 100$ off the other stores prices. Very satisfied , Can't wait to purchase.

resp.text:
Hi Mike,
Thanks for taking the time to rate us and leave a comment. We strive to treat everyone like family.  Welcome to our family!!

name: Rick Ward
text: Linden Ace Hardware is a great small town hardware store. The staff is very knowledgeable and extremely helpful. If they don't have what you need they can get it within a week. The owner will bend over backwards to help.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to rate us.  We always enjoy seeing you and your family.

resp.text: Thank you for your rating and kind comments

name: Jennifer Ashdown mcclinton
text: I love this place they have a lot of helpers and they have everything Bill loves TOOLS 😀

resp.text: Jennifer, Thank you so much for your review.  We strive to be everyone's number one place to shop.

name: Sandra Ward
text: I'm grateful for this local store, because they have what I need for working in the yard, for bird watching, AND they have all the necessary tools for home improvement! At every visit, I'm greeted with a smile and attentive service.

resp.text: Thank you for rating us!  We appreciate you guys.

name: Tommie Younger
text: Great hometown store.  Owner is very helpful and courteous.

resp.text: Thank you for your comments.  I always enjoy seeing you in the store or speaking with you on the phone.  Have a great day.

name: David Pritchett
text: Great place to shop; helpful staff; honest and friendly owner.

resp.text: David,  I really appreciate you taking the time to rate us.  It is always great to see you in the store.

name: Randy Gibbs
text: Great home town hardware store...

name: Kemp Akins
text: Great Store

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to rate our store.

name: Tom Johnson
text: Helpful staff

resp.text: Thank you for your comments.  We appreciate your business

name: Dorothy Baldwin
text: Neighborhood store

resp.text: Thank you for rating us on Google

name: Michael Nash
text: One stop shop

resp.text: Thank you for rating our store

name: Amanda Ackman
text:
They were not very helpful or knowledgeable about their products. I have a custom job and budget is unlimited and they still tried to get me to just purchase generic floor models. I was given a phone number and told to leave and call that number to discuss further. However, the number I was given was to a person who was sitting in the office while I was there. I didn't understand why I couldn't speak to him when I could see him just sitting there. We are remodeling 1800 square feet and adding on an additional 2-3000 square feet. They lost a huge sale and future business.

In response to their comment:
Yes, this is the correct business. My information was not written down. I was given a base quote and told that it did not reflect actual prices. I took my business to Townsend and they sat down with me immediately and were able to give us exactly what we wanted.

resp.text: Amanda, we apologize for your experience. It seems you may have posted this review for the incorrect company. We have also been unable to locate you in our system. If we are mistaken, please reach out to us at (334) 794-6369 so we may provide further assistance.

name: Terri Hutto
text: Great service and excellent installation.  Very professional installers and all old windows were removed. Would definitely recommend Window World for purchase and installation.

resp.text: Hi Terri! Thank you for sharing your feedback with us! We're happy you had a great experience with Window World. Please let us know if you need anything in the future. Have a great day!

name: John Robinson
text: No complaints about this business. Easy to work with and knowledgeable about their products.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, John! So glad you had a great experience with us.

name: Genevieve Lanham
text:
I dealt with Mike & Mikey - they were both very courteous and professional. I have nothing but good things to say about my experience with this company. They were clean, punctual, and very polite - and my new windows look fantastic! I would recommend these guys to anyone in the market for new windows! My neighbor was even impressed enough that he came over and asked about a future project! =) Thanks, Window World. Thanks, Mike and Mikey!

- Genevieve Lanham

resp.text: Hi, Genevieve! We appreciate your taking the time to do this review. We will always work hard to meet your expectations, and glad we did. Our team will always be here if you ever need anything in the future. Thank you for the recommendation, and trust in our company. Hope you have a great day!

text: Once they items were produced, quick and seemless installation. Great windows for our lake front home. I would recommend them for any home.

name: Chase McClellan
text: I was initially very satisfied with this company. But after we ordered a flange for our windows that needed to be installed due to the remodel of our home, we were questioned as to why we needed it to continue. And we’re also told that because of covid19 it was back ordered for 8 weeks but as soon as they got it in they would be out the next to install. And it’s been at the plant for a week know and nobody has come to install. Very disappointed with the end result. Hopefully nobody else will have the problems my family has had.

resp.text: Thanks for the great rating Chase!

name: Mike Cee
text:
Window World of Dothan just finished up doing the rest of our windows.  We had some done earlier this year, and the rest of the windows done today.  Both times I was extremely pleased with the entire process, from sales to installation.  Great professionalism, excellent service, and all around wonderful people to work with.

We did have one issue with a pane that the seal failed on.  That's a real test of the warranty, and I was very pleased with how easy it was to get it corrected.  Small issues happen, what really counts is how they're handled.  Window World of Dothan made the process of get it replaced so easy-one quick email and it was done.

Kudos to the entire team at Window World of Dothan.  You folks are great, and I have no problem recommending you.

resp.text: Thanks Mike. Appreciate your business and taking the time to do this review. Apologies for any inconvenience, but happy that you are satisfied with the final product.

name: C. Gatlin
text:
If I could give Window World of Dothan, AL a -100, I would.  I would NEVER refer them to anyone nor EVER use them again.  They are the absolute worst in customer service.  The salesperson is the face of the company and that’s about as good as it gets.   It is difficult to contact them by phone and when you do no one is ever around who has any answers.  The receptionist or answering service must always get back to you, and usually never the same day.  I don’t know the criteria for Window World being ranked as the #1 replacement company in America, but it can’t be based on any contributions from Window World of Dothan, AL, at least not for doors and shutters.

We contracted with Window World of Dothan, AL on 1 Oct 2019 for 10 sets of outdoor shutters and a front door.  The install should have only taken a day. The install began on 16 Nov in the late afternoon and still has not been completed as of today, 9 Jan 2020.  The individual sent to install the shutters and door obviously didn’t care about the job because the quality of the installs were substandard.  We tried to give him space and let him do his job, but that was a mistake because when we looked closer at the tall shutters they were installed with only 4 pegs instead of 6 (industry standard) and did not place the pegs uniformly (symmetrically) into the mortar, some directly into the brick.  When asked if 4 pegs was a Window World standard, he said it didn't matter.  We also asked if he filled the old holes and he stated "some",  which we knew meant "none". His defense was to say there were lots of holes in our house.

The installer completed the haphazard shutter install and departed because it started to drizzle and he didn't want the caulking to get wet. He was supposed to return the next day (Friday) to install the door.  He sent a text on Friday to say he was still on a job in GA and wouldn't arrive until the afternoon. We responded that we didn't like afternoon appointments because he would be rushing the door install the same way he rushed the shutter install and make more mistakes.  He agreed to return the following day in the morning.  Meanwhile, my wife attempted to call Window World, Dothan several times to ask about the standards for shutter installation but no one ever called her back.

As he was installing the door on Saturday, we let him know the door was not square in the frame.  His ongoing response was to tell us that our house was the reason the door wasn't straight. Once the install was complete we continued to let him know we were not satisfied with the way the door looked in the frame.  As he prepared to install the storm door, he realized the frame had to be shimmed and stated he would return on Sunday to finish the job.  When he returned at 9am we told him that the thresh hold needed to be adjusted more because we could see car lights under the door and feel the cold air. He appeared a little agitated. He became more agitated when my wife asked "hypothetically" what would happen if we wanted to discuss the possibility of getting another door. He then said he could fix the door.  My wife asked him if that was the case why he hadn't fixed it in the first place.  He proceeded to tell my wife that she complained about the shutters and every little thing about the door. He then stopped what he was doing and left the storm door uninstalled.  He told her that day was his last day at Window World so he didn't care if we complained.

My wife called Window World the following Monday  and asked to speak to the owner.  Instead of being contacted by the owner, the salesman was sent for damage control.  He stated he would have the shutters reordered and expedited.  Another installer was sent to correct the door install.  He made some additional adjustments that helped but was still not the quality of install we expected.  It is currently 9 Jan 2020 and we have not heard from Window World about the shutters or the fact that we are extremely DISSATISFIED customers.  Their lack of care, concern, and communication speaks volumes about the organization.

resp.text: Mr. Gatlin, we appreciate the time spent sharing this information with us. There are several items mentioned in your comments that we are not clear on from our previous communications with you. We would appreciate the opportunity to discuss in more detail, as well as give you an update on the shutters we reordered for you. Management will reach out to you promptly to discuss. Regards.

They also made sure we had all warranty papers and understood them all including who and how to contact if there were ever and problems with the windows. The entire experience was a pleasure!

name: Scott Chisling
text: Didn't arrive after waiting for two weeks for an appointment to get a quote for 23 windows. I even confirmed the appointment two days prior. Took time off work to be there at the agreed upon and verified time. Got phone call at the time of the appointment and was told..."sorry we can't make it today".  You couldn't call an hour before and let me know so I didn't leave work and waste vacation time? Complete amateur hour stuff right there. I'll take my 23 windows replacement job elsewhere where they understand the use of calendars, watches and value their customer's time.

resp.text:
Hi Mr. Chisling,
Sorry for the inconvenience we may have caused today. We take a lot of pride in being prompt and professional.  Our salesman had vehicle troubles that caused a delay in arriving on time.  I'm sorry you were not notified sooner than 15 minutes prior to your appointment.  The issue has been addressed and the office will reach out for rescheduling an appointment at your convenience.

In helping me find the right product for my project and budget, they patiently showed and explained various options to me.  Weeks later when I finally got fed up with not being able to make a decision I asked them for help on deciding the right color.  They considered the colors I was forced to work with and those I planed to use and helped me pick a beautiful floor.

Finally, they happily match sales prices when the price on a product is reduced after it is purchased  (30 day price guarantee I believe).

These guys will have my business for any future projects I create for myself.  They are more patient with me than I am!

Thanks for the review. We're happy to hear your visit to the showroom was a success and our team was able to be of service. We value your feedback and always look forward to new projects. Take care!

name: Ben
text: ProSource has been so easy to work with. They give great advice and don't rush like the more well known franchises and big box stores. I will use them again when I do my next renovation.

resp.text:
Hi Ben,
Thanks for the review. We're elated to hear you enjoy working with our showroom and that the process was easy going. We appreciate your feedback and always look forward to new projects. Come back and see us anytime, take care!

name: Jeff Pierce
text: So happy we found this place! Prices and quality were outstanding but the help we received from Christoper, one of the family members that own it, was invaluable. Although they do a lot of business with pro contractors, Christopher took the time to help us (DIYers) select cabinets, a soaker tub and fixtures. We highly recommend ProSource! Jeff

resp.text:
Hi Jeff,
Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. We're so pleased to hear you enjoyed utilizing our showroom and working alongside Christopher. We appreciate your awesome review and look forward to your next project!

name: George Sadowski
text: If you have not shopped at pro source then you need to. The selection by far is the best in the Birmingham area the store room is beautiful as well as the selections of products. I must say the staff is excellent. I highly recommend that you stop in even if you are not building or remodeling and once you do, you will go home with ideas so that you will want to remodel.

resp.text: Hi George, thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback! We are pleased to hear that you had a great experience and hope to see you again soon. Take care!

name: Barbara Klein
text:
I had the opportunity of consulting, with Chris at Pro Source.  He was very patient, friendly and a good listener, of what products I was interested in. I had a kitchen flood that affected three rooms, with flooring needing tile/ carpeting, as well as, . backsplash tile. He had a wealth of knowledge, of all their materials and shared advice on my possible interests.  I was given many samples to take home to see
the colors, with my lighting and existing colors I was trying to coordinate together. I would highly recommend Pro Source materials  and Chris making my remodeling a good experience.

resp.text: Hi Barbara, thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback. We are pleased to hear that you had a great experience and will pass along your kind words to Chris.

name: Mitch Jones
text: We needed to remodel a rental property and had gotten several quotes from different people before going to ProSource.  ProSource had the BEST prices AND they were the most eager to help us find what we needed within our budget.  Christopher and his staff are FANTASTIC!! Great showroom too, highly recommend them!

resp.text: Hi Mitch, thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback! We are pleased to hear that you had a great experience and will pass along your kind words to Christopher. Take care!

resp.text: Hi Tim, thank you so much for the positive review! We are glad that we can offer such a large selection to our customers. Come back on the next project!

name: Caleb Hennon
text: I love this Sherwin Williams location. One time there was a fairly large mistake on an order of mine that happened and they immediately fixed the issue and kept apologizing for it. Before that, the staff was always very friendly and helpful. After that incident, though, the staff have become even more friendly and now remember my name and the company I work for so making and picking up orders is a breeze. They also seem to have a positive work environment because they always seem to be having some fun conversation with each other as I walk in about things like movies, their plans for the weekend, or other things like that. This never distracts them from helping me, though, and I am grateful for the employees here. They've helped me several times.

Unfortunately, that SW computer system had the formula wrong and my paint looked totally different.  We called April and she was able to give us the formula over the phone so I could get the paint at a different store.  For someone who wasn’t even making a sale, she was more than helpful and patient and went above and beyond for us.

text: The clerk was great but the paint didn't cover the old paint at all. It will probably take 3-4 coats to cover the light color. I've never had this problem before.

resp.text: We appreciate your review and apologize for this situation. We would like to better understand the product issue you're experiencing. We encourage you to first call or visit the store where the product was purchased. If you have any additional questions or would like to discuss your concerns with us directly, please give us a call at 1-800-4Sherwin (474-3794) or email us at https://www.sherwin-williams.com/homeowners/contact-us/feedback. Thank you. Sincerely, T.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

name: Michael Gosnell
text: I generally never go here because of the prices.  It had been a long time since I used their paint but I had a client who wanted it.  Staff was friendly and store was cleaned and we'll stocked.  However, it cost $630 for 10 gallons of paint!  Holy cow!  Same amount of paint at Home Depot for Behr Premium would have been $232.  Paint was fine but I actually prefer the quality of the cheaper paint.  They did carry the paint out to my truck with a dolly but I could have hired two people for the day to help me ALL day for the price difference.

resp.text:
Hi Michael, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We're sorry you feel our pricing is not in line with the industry. As a corporation, Sherwin-Williams has made great strides to control costs on everything from raw materials to office supplies in order to stay priced competitively. We have increased prices only as a last resort and in most cases, after our competitors have already done so. We do offer many sales and promotions throughout the year. In addition, if you sign up for our PaintPerks program you will receive a $10 off of $50 coupon, everyday discounts on paints, stains and supplies and exclusive sales and emails. For more information on this program, please visit www.mysw.com. We thank you for sharing this feedback with us. If you have any additional questions, please give us a call at 1-800-4Sherwin (474-3794) or email us at https://www.sherwin-williams.com/homeowners/contact-us/feedback.
Thank you. Sincerely, T.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

The savings?
Edited from original. I'm happy with my purchase from this business, my original post was a little harsh, I paid $ for an item I saw at Costco two days later for $10 more so when I saw this boxed item at Costco for $10 more I was slightly irritated. That being said Bargain Depot is a good place to shop and the owner seems very honest and trustworthy.

resp.text: Mr. Powell - I am sorry that you are unhappy with your purchase price.  Because retailers are always changing their prices, it is sometimes difficult for me to keep up with on each and every product.  This particular item used to be $99 at Costco but even that changes depending on which Costco you shop with or if it is online or not.  Again, I am sorry for your unhappiness and if you would like to get a refund, I will do that.

name: Debbie Daniel
text: I have tried for two years to have a glass company come and look at a custom made double paned window that needed the inside glass replaced.  No luck.  Then I thought I will try one more time.  I call Huntsville Glass, Mr. James Davis came out and looked at the window, they called and gave me the estimate, and once the glass was in Mr. Davis came back and installed the glass.  He was exceptionally professional, let me know when he would be out and in no time it was done.  I really appreciate the service.  The window looks great.  I will do business only with Huntsville Glass.  I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Wow Debbie! We hate to hear that you ran into so much trouble before you found us. James is definitely an asset to our company as well as to our customers. Thank you!

name: Debbie Schaffer
text: We are repeat customers - this is our second glass shower door installed by Huntsville Glass, and we are extremely pleased. From our first phone conversation, the installer coming to the house to measure, and the actual installation, Huntsville Glass was professional, courteous, careful, and did excellent work.The first door was installed over 4 years ago and still looks beautiful and works like new today. The second door - a slider door, is only a week old, but we are loving it. If we needed a third shower door, I would call Huntsville Glass! Over the years, I've also had various pieces of picture frame glass and mirror glass cut to size and had excellent service too. Thanks to installers John and Curtis!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know you have had a great overall experience with us over the years Debbie. We are always glad to hear our technicians and staff are taking great care of our customers. We look forward to continuing to help you with your glass and mirror needs!

name: cathy veque
text: We have had Huntsville Glass replace the double pane glass in several of the windows at our home.  They are very good to work with from the office to the technicians.  They arrived on time and went right to work.  They did the reinstall  in a short time frame and were very professional and courteous.  Today was our 2nd time to use them for this service and they were once again a pleasure to work with.

resp.text: Always a pleasure to hear from repeat customers. We hope to always be your "go to" for any and all of your glass needs.

name: Ryan Green
text: Punctual, quick, and affordable. Responded to my broken window situation in very little time. Pleased with my experience would use HGC again for my glass needs. James JR did a great job and was very communicative during the entire process. Thank you!

resp.text: Ryan, we are so glad to hear about your pleasurable experience. It's always great to hear when our employees put extra effort into customer service and communication. We look forward to serving you again!

name: Sheryl Payne
text: Recently a rock got flung toward my storm door while the front yard was being mowed.  I had one of those decorative films on the window pane that actually kept the glass from shattering everywhere. I called HSV Glass and working with the support team was very easy. I accepted the estimate and 3 weeks later my new window pane is installed. Mr. John May and Mr. James Davis, Sr. came out this morning and did a great job of removing the old shattered pane and installing the new one.  I was told to let the window 'set' for about 24 hours to really let the seal do it's job and after that I can put a new film on if I wanted.  I really appreciate the work the guys did and of the great customer support /service from Ms. Sherri.

resp.text: Sheryl, we appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We understand that dealing with the unexpected can be difficult. So glad to hear that we provided such service.

name: Jon Hutchinson
text: Very pleased with Huntsville Glass. Very friendly, courteous and professional staff. James and James Jr. did a fantastic install of a new pane to replace one that was broken by a flying rock.

resp.text: Thank you Jon!!

name: Derrick Graham
text:
I wanted to share my testimony. It’s long but it just shows how much this company cares.

I took my broken window glass to Huntsville Glass for repair. They gave me a temporary one because it would take around five weeks for permanent fixture to  return for pickup.  During this time, I took my bent screen frame to them, or so I thought.  I was told they were unable to do the work and referred me to another company in Huntsville.  Due to my poor memory, I forgot about the conversation. I called to inquiry when would the work be completed. They searched and searched around their facility and couldn’t find it.  To make a long story short, they went the extra mile and called other glass and screen repair companies. They found my screen, through their tireless efforts, they coordinated with those companies to get it repaired. Then, they called me and told me where it was and gave me the number. I was so impressed and I felt bad because I thought they had it.  I apologized and to my surprise, they were very kind and patient with me.

I said all of that to say this!!!!! THIS COMPANY CARES ABOUT YOU AND YOUR BUSINESS!!!!!’ Thank you all for being so professional and patient with me.

resp.text: Its great to know that some businesses still care about their customers. It is an honor to be included in that prestigious group.

name: Camaria Caudle
text: Huntsville Glass has worked with us for years! James Davis, Jr. Is amazing! Our residents always have nothing but nice things to say when he come to the property. Service is always professional, and timely.

resp.text: Camaria, Thank you for taking the time to let us know how pleased you are. We especially appreciate you telling us that the customer service you receive is consistently excellent!

resp.text: Fantastic!! Glad to hear!

The replacement of our broken window glass was done as scheduled and to our satisfaction. I would definitely recommend Huntsville Glass for home or business glass repair/replace work!

resp.text: We appreciate your recommendation. It was pleasure serving you. We look forward to serving you again.

My glass top for my desk is fantastic.  Highly recommend the Huntsville Glass Company Team!  Thank you John and James.

name: mike fischer
text:
Huntsville Glass Company of Huntsville, Al  staff were phenomenal, all the way from the initial call, to the technicians contacting me to arrange a the initial service call to measure the window to be replaced, and subsequently arriving. The staff was professional and courteous. The Staff contacted me with a price quote, which was extremely reasonable, and a best estimate with when the replacement glass should arrive.
The technicians contacted me the day prior to arrange a convenient time to replace the damaged glass, in turn showed up promptly at the scheduled time. Both technicians, # 80 and #95 were the utmost courteous and professional, went right to work, answered all the questions very honestly and forthright.  They completed the task and the workmanship was stellar from start to finish.
I would highly recommend Huntsville Glass to anyone now and in the future.

resp.text: OUTSTANDING!! We are very proud of all our employees, from the office staff to the installers. Thank you so much for taking the time to express all your kind words. We are so very pleased to hear of your positive experience and we look forward to serving you again!

text: As a custom cabinet company, we rely heavily on skilled glass professionals to provide high quality glass and mirror products.
