resp.text: We were very pleased to provide you a timely, worry free installation!!

name: Kim Carter
text: We requested a quote for one large fogged/failed window and a broken bathroom window on a Friday and by Monday John and James were there to take measurements. Fast service!  I really wanted the grille color to match the neighboring windows. John had a fan deck of colors with him and James was awesome  when I stopped in the store to place my order, helping to assure me the right color was ordered.  Once the windows arrived they were able to come out the next day and I was so happy the install crew was going to be John and James again.  They were quick, efficient and wonderful to work with.  Will definitely hire them again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your thorough review Kim. We do have some pretty amazing technicians and we are so glad to hear you had a great experience. We look forward to helping you again in the future!

name: Harold Robinson
text: John and James did a very good job replacing glass panels in a 40 year old door. They were early for their appointment to boot. Very happy.

resp.text: Harold, Thank You for letting us know you were pleased! We like it when our installers exceed expectations!

name: Al Moore
text: Replaced a large fixed pane in the peak of a gable. They were right on schedule and I was very pleased with the work. They took extra care cleaning up after the job. I will definitely use them again.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback! We look forward to working with you again.

name: TA CHUNG WANG
text: They showed up on time and were very professional. The two gentlemen, John and James, demonstrated excellent workmanship. They replaced glass of my 78” arch window and you can’t tell the frame was worked on. It was a very pleasant encounter.  It is a five star coming from me.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing about your recent experience. We are so glad to hear our technicians took great care of you and your home. We would be happy to help you again in the future!

name: Meghan Stewart
text: Huntsville Glass showed up to estimate and installation appointments on time and swiftly made the repair.  Their price was extremely fair and competitive.  Their installers explained the job to us in detail, making us feel very comfortable with the quality and timeliness of the work being performed.  We'd give them a 15/10 if we could!

resp.text: Meghan, we really appreciate you letting us know that you had a great overall experience. We are glad to have been able to help and would be happy to help with any future glass needs!

name: Bob B.
text: Hsv Glass installed a glass walk-in shower for us. Their technicians, John Saeger & Curtis Campell, were prompt, professional, and completed entire job in 2 hours.  It looks beautiful. We would definitely use them again.

resp.text: Bob, we appreciate you taking time to tell us about your experience. We are lucky to have such talents on our team. We look forward to working with you again!

name: H2Brew
text: In this case, do not buy local. I could have saved over $700 buying this glass online, and it would have arrived already, but I really wanted to support local businesses. I spent over $1100 for a few pieces of trapezoids and rectangles at 5/8" low-e. It has been over a month and the glass is still not here. Just excuses about broken or mis-sized pieces. I will have the glass someday, it will probably be the wrong size and I will have to live with it. Never again though.

name: Mike Tilley
text: My experience with Huntsville Glass has been totally positive.  They have been friendly, helpful, courteous, prompt, competent, and go the extra mile.  They will get my future business.

resp.text: Mr. Tilley, thank you for sharing. We look forward to working with you again.

name: Jeffrey Boudreau
text: John and James were excellent! They arrived exactly when they were scheduled to, took very little time to get the job done, and were very courteous and prompt about updates with the job itself. Our new window looks great!

resp.text: Jeffrey, thank you for taking the time to let us know how great our technicians did. We really appreciate your feedback. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

name: Edie Hermes
text: Excellent work and friendliness. Very prompt and precise. Also fairly priced. James Davis Sr & John May are my favorite - they have been out a few times and are outstanding

resp.text: We are so glad to hear you have had several outstanding experiences with our company, Edie. We really appreciate you sharing about your overall experience and would be happy to help you again in the future!

name: Lori Hall
text: If I could give 10 stars, I would. From start to finish Huntsville Glass Company was professional and speedy! I called to get an estimate on a half round window that had a broken seal. They came out within a day to give me an estimate and it was replaced within two weeks. John and James were an amazing team.  I was so impressed I asked them to replace the glass in a master shower enclosure. They measured while they were there, and I had an estimate within a few days. The glass came a week earlier than expected, and James and John came back and replaced the whole enclosure in less than an hour. Such a great experience. Thank you!

resp.text: Lori, your thorough review is greatly appreciated. We are glad to have been able to help you and see that our technicians took great care of you with all of your glass needs. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

name: Chad Bickford
text: We had an accident with a window at home. I've done business with these wonder folks through work on multiple occasions and I didn't think twice about calling them first. I was given a fair price and a 2 to 3 week date of turnover. Day 13 and the window is back in with a perfect fit. Angie, again I want to thank you and the guys for such great service and customer service. I'll throw all the business I can at y'all. Thank you so much!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Chad. We are grateful for your loyalty and really appreciate you taking the time to give us a thorough review. We look forward to helping you in the future!

name: Eric Skeldon
text: Had 3 windows replaced. John May and James Davis (installers) did a very professional job. Lowe's wanted to replace the entire window sills for the 3 windows. John and James gave me an estimate to replace the glass only. Less than half the price of Lowe's. They took the window frames apart and replaced the glass. In and out in couple hours. Job well done.  Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing Eric. Sadly we hear similar stories all the time where people are told by other companies that they have to replace the entire window and not just the glass. I am glad you found us and that our technicians took great care of you. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

name: Jimmy Parry
text: The outside pane of glass on one of our windows was broken by a bird or a frisbee.  We called HSV Glass Company, they sent someone out to give us an estimate. We paid for the glass,  They were very flexible as we had to reschedule the installation many times.  James Davis Sr. and James Davis Jr. came out and replaced the broken window glass.  They were professional and fast.  I will be calling them again when I have broken glass in the future.

resp.text: FANTASTIC! Your feedback is very much appreciated. It's great to hear that our guys were able to accommodate your scheduling needs. We look forward to working with you again.

name: Grace Black
text: Called to get an estimate and the woman on the phone was so rude! They obviously don’t care about doing business with people or fostering lasting business relationships to encourage repeat customers. I guess they don’t need business. Called K&M glass instead and they were so friendly and answered all my questions. Will recommend K&M to everyone that needs glass repair!

resp.text: Grace, we are so incredibly sorry that you had a bad experience. That is never our intention and we are addressing the problem. If you call back and ask for Stephanie she will take great care of you. We sincerely apologize for the bad customer service you received and we hope to be able to earn back your business in the future.

name: Margaret Dukeman
text: As usual Stephanie was a delight to work as was your new employee.  However, when I arrived your other employee who sits in the West corner never made any motion to see or ask if I needed any help.  As I stood there waiting and waiting.  Finally Stephanie peeked our from what looked like a lunch area to see if I needed help.  She was obviously at lunch but she stopped her lunch and came out and helped me.  Still the other lady never did look up or ask if she could help.  This isn’t the type of service I have grown accustomed to at your place of business. Your company is far better than that.  You got five stars because of Stephanie and her exceptional attention to detail and always providing me with exactly what I needed!  Not just every store is willing to work with an artist and their creative ideas and carry them through in a stellar manner.

resp.text: Margaret, we really appreciate you providing a thorough review of your most recent experience. Your feedback is very important to us and we will do everything we can to ensure a better experience the next time. We hope to continue to be a great source for your glass needs.

name: Lesa Saylor
text: Great work from John and James. I was very pleased that they arrived on time and did a perfect job. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give a review Lesa. We really appreciate you letting us know how well our technicians did. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

name: Kathleen Abalos
text: Very happy with the widow replacements. John May and James Davis did an excellent job. They were professional and personable.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience Kathleen. We are so glad to hear our technicians did an excellent job and we really appreciate your feedback. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

name: Becky Kelly
text: Three of our sunroom glass doors needed to be replaced.  Huntsville Glass got in the doors in less than three weeks and John came out to install them.  They look beautiful!!  Thanks so much for your hard work!  Will definitely call Huntsville Glass the next time we need glass work!!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know about your experience Becky. We are glad to hear the replacement glass looks great. We would be happy to help you again in the future!

name: Mary Thompson
text: They underpromised and overdelivered.  I needed replacement glass for a double hung window that had lost its seal. I was told it would be a couple of business days before they scheduled a measurement appt and they scheduled the next day!  I was told it would take 2-3 weeks for the replacement glass to be installed and John May and James Davis, Sr.  were back the next week to install. They were in and out in less than 15 minutes!

resp.text: With so much going wrong, it sure is nice when something goes right. We are at the mercy of our distributors with regards to receiving the products we order in a timely fashion. Unfortunately, things don't always go as planned. We are so glad they came through for you and we were able to get it installed so quickly.

name: Meike Fisk
text: I was selling my property and had two windows that needed replacing. One had thermal seal failure and one was broken.  I had gotten a quote from a “window” company and they said the whole window plus the transom above it would have to be replaced and their cost was over 1700.00.  I called another glass company and they have yet to call me back to even come out and look at replacing the glass only. I called  Huntsville Glass and I believe they came out within 2 days to measure and give me a quote. It was under 600.00. After I gave them the go ahead to order the replacement glass I was told it would take 2-3 weeks and that was fine with me but they came in at least a week sooner and they installed them within two days of calling me to say they were in!! John and James arrived right on time and were finished quickly and left behind no mess.  The even answered my questions and explained the process to me patiently.  I will definitely use them again!  I appreciate their exemplary customer service!

resp.text: Meike, we are so glad to have been able to provide you with a great experience and are thankful that you took the time to provide an in depth review. We really appreciate your feedback and will be happy to help you in the future!

name: Mike Brown
text: Great job.  John May and James Davis Jr. arrived on time and were very courteous.  Worked around other contractors.  Office staff were very helpful.  We have used Huntsville Glass for decades and never been disappointed.

resp.text: We are so glad to have your continued business Mike. Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences. We look forward to assisting you in the future!

name: Adrian Fann
text: Hsv Glass came out to estimate when they said they would. Got back the next day with the estimate which was fair. Told me it would take 3 weeks, it did. Called to schedule an appointment to install at my convenience. Showed up on time and began work. Worked all day to get it done. Cleaned up and were gone. Very satisfied with their work.

resp.text: Adrian, we appreciate you letting us know about your experience. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

name: Megan Dey
text: Both John and Curtis were wonderful and well-knowledgeable with their craftsmanship. I highly recommend them from Huntsville Glass.

resp.text: Megan, your feedback is greatly appreciated. We are so glad to hear how well our technicians took care of you. Thank you for sharing your experience. We would be happy to help you again in the future!

name: Denise Garrison
text: Had exterior glass door resealed. Repair was scheduled easily and in timely manner. Technicians, Mr May and Mr Davis Sr. arrived on time on repair was done quickly. Repair was exceptionally less than replacing door. I would use their service again without any hesitation.

resp.text: We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience Denise. Your feeback is greatly appreciated. We would be happy to help you with any of your glass needs!

name: SM Battles
text: Leading Edge Trophies & Screen Printing came to Huntsville Glass with a last minute job that needed to be done immediately.  Stephanie, Angie and Shari went above and beyond to get the job done.  It turned out beautifully.  Thanks Huntsville Glass Company and your courteous Staff.

resp.text: We are very glad to have been able to help you with your last minute needs. Thank you for letting us know that our staff took great care of you. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. If you need anything else we will be happy to help.

name: Chris M
text: Excellent. Professional, fast, reliable, not expensive, kindly and helpful. I haven't ordered anything fancy nor complicated , but they helped me to have it in the best possible way. I will definitely ask them next time I need a glass work!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience Chris. We are so glad to have been able to help you and look forward to assisting you in the future!

name: Jessica T. McNair
text: What a great experience!  Stephanie went above and beyond from the very beginning. I told her in person that the service she offers is rare, and I really appreciate how helpful she was. She is full of ideas and helped me creatively resolve the issue I came to her and Huntsville Glass with. And the price was better than expected too!  Can’t recommend enough! I’m a very happy customer.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know our staff took great care of you Jessica. We really appreciate you taking the time to write a thorough review.  If you have any other glass needs we will be happy to assist you!

name: Nemil Shah
text: Great experience with this company and especially John and Curtis. They are quick, detail oriented and above all trustworthy. I highly recommend this team.

resp.text: We are so glad to hear you had a great experience Nemil. We really appreciate you letting us know and that our technicians took great care of you. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

name: Kitchen Designer
text: Stephanie and Hsv Glass are great!!! Very prompt, very efficient, always right and always on time!! We've never had any issues whatsoever when ordering glass for our cabinets!  We typically email our orders and go to the store to pick them up....we are very pleased with the service we receive and will continue to count on Huntsville Glass for our needs.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience with Huntsville Glass. We value your business and look forward to our continued business relationship. Your feedback is greatly appreciated!

name: Monte Davis
text: They were timely and the install only took 20 minutes. Thank you guys!

resp.text: You are very welcome Monte!

name: Glen Jones
text: Excellent experience.  They installed multiple panes of glass in very old window frames (19 pieces of glass in window frames that are pushing 100 yrs old).  price was very-very good for assistance and service provided.  they  are experienced and provided good suggestions on options for how things could be done and what to expect with each.  Friendly service counter staff.  I'll definitely use this business for future work.

resp.text: Thank you Glen for your review. We really appreciate your feedback and are so glad to hear our technicians and staff took great care of you. We look forward to helping you again!

name: Joyce Brewster
text: James gave professional and courteous service. He was patient and answered all our questions. Knowledgeable young man.

resp.text: Joyce, we really appreciate you letting us know about your experience with our technician. I am glad he was able to assist you. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

name: Tammy Anderson
text: Huntsville Glass did an excellent job replacing a broken window for us.  John and James were very prompt and professional when they came to give the quote and replace the window.  Our window came in sooner than expected and setting up the appointment was a breeze!  The guys even installed it in the rain.  I would definitely use Huntsville Glass again.  Everyone we dealt with, from the office staff to the installers were a pleasure to work with.  Thanks Huntsville Glass!!

resp.text: We are so glad to hear you had a great overall experience Tammy. Thank you for letting us know. We really appreciate your feedback and would be happy to help you again!

name: Bradley Thomas
text: I called to get an estimate on a bathroom mirror and spoke to an incredibly rude woman on the phone. She did a poor job explaining the dimensions that were needed and became frustrated easily. Chose not to do business with a company with poor customer service.

resp.text: I am so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience. We sincerely apologize. I'm not sure what was going on, but if you are still in need of a mirror please call and talk to Stephanie. She will take good care of you. Once again, I am sorry for the inconvenience and we never want our customers to have a bad experience.

name: Jill Burton
text: Great Customer Service!   Stephanie, Angie and Shari are always ready to help.  Glad to have them as a business partner.

resp.text: Jill, we really appreciate you letting us know that our staff takes great care of you. We are glad to be of assistance and look forward to helping you in the future!

name: Randy Taylor
text: I ordered a custom piece of glass and the staff was very prompt and courteous.  They worked with me to reschedule based on my availability.  John and James did a good job, and within the the time estimated.

resp.text: We are so glad to hear you had a great experience Randy. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

name: Alicia Fox
text: Thank you Huntsville Glass!! and Thank You John and James for your amazing work!! Highly recommended

resp.text: Alicia, we really appreciate your feedback. We always love to hear our technicians did amazing work. Thank you for letting us know. If you need anything else in the future we would be happy to help!

name: Diona Salverson
text: Huntsville Glass replaced one of the windows in our iron front door.  They got the window in with a scratch so they returned it and reordered.  In came in less than two weeks and they scheduled a crew for the first available opportunity.  The installation crew consisted of John May and James Davis, arrived when they said they would, they had the window installed in a short time, cleaned up their work area and were on their way.  They were pleasant, polite and courteous.  They answered all our questions.  We would recommend this company and this crew to anyone needing glass replacement anytime.

resp.text: Thank you Diona for sharing your experience. We really appreciate the feedback and are so glad to hear that our technicians took great care of you. We are happy to help with all your glass needs!

name: Michael R

resp.text: We are glad to hear you had a great experience Michael. Thank you for letting us know about our technicians work. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

name: Mary Smith
text: John and Curtis arrived on time, greeted me, introduced themselves and got to work.  We are happy with our large mirror install.

resp.text: Mary, we really appreciate you letting us know about your recent experience. I'm glad that John and Curtis took great care of you and that you love your new mirror. We would be happy to help with any of your future glass or mirror needs!

text:
I called Huntsville Glass with a plethora of
questions & Sherry was very polite & tried to be helpful but unfortunately she didn’t have all the answers, so she gave the phone to Stephanie. And thanks to them, when I do get around to getting my glass situation taken care of, Huntsville Glass will be my only call.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience Makenzy. We really appreciate you letting us know that our employees took the necessary steps to ensure your questions were answered. We look forward to helping you in the future!

name: Saundra Adams

text: Called them to replace a broken window on my house. Excellent service and price. They also replaced the window screens. Professional Technicians (John and James).

resp.text: We are so glad to hear you had a great experience Greer. We really appreciate you letting us know and that our technicians took great care of you. If you have any future glass or screen needs we would be happy to help!

name: Rhonda Roland
text: They did a great job installing custom shower doors.  Very prompt and courteous.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know about your experience Rhonda. We really appreciate the feedback and would be happy to help you again in the future!

name: Drenda King
text: I had a large glass replaced in a door and was extremely pleased with the personnel in both the store and the installation process at my home. My technicians were John May and James Davis, Jr. who were courteous, professional, timely and expert. Very good experience!

resp.text: Drenda, we are always happy to hear our staff and technicians took great care of our customers. Thank you for letting us know about your experience. We would be happy to help you again if you need any glass in the future!

name: Michael Bedard
text: Made good in the end

resp.text: We are glad to hear it!

name: Jim Perkins
text: John and James did an excellent job both in measuring for and replacement of our windows with broken seals.  They are knowledgeable, efficient, and take a sincere interest in customer satisfaction.

resp.text: Jim, we are so glad to hear our technicians took great care of you. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

name: Chip Carter
text: John May and James Davis were excellent in measuring and replacing our insulated glass windows. In and out very quick. Love looking out new windows.

resp.text: Your feedback is greatly appreciated Charles. It's always good to know our technicians are taking care of our customers. I'm glad you like the new window glasses. We would be happy to help if you have any future glass needs!

name: Sally Thrower
text:
We had a storm window recently broken while the yard was being mowed.
We called Huntsville Glass who was very friendly and helpful.  Two employees came out that day to measure for a repair quote which we received the next day.  Those two employees  John May and James Davis Sr. came back to the repair work.  They were friendly and knowledgeable in doing their work.  They also made sure that the window area was clean and no broken glass fell on the ground.  Thank you so much.
Josephine Adams

resp.text: Thank you so much for the thorough review Sally. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We hope to help you again with any future glass needs!

name: John Bearden
text: I'm allergic to cats...and was greeted by one when I entered the door. Honestly I don't know more to say. I left quickly.

resp.text: I am sorry we were not able to assist you with your glass needs. We have actually had a cat at this location since it opened in 1941, but we are aware people have allergies to cats and will gladly make accommodations to serve you best. If you can let us know that you have an allergy to cats before coming to the store or tell us you have an allergy when you walk in the door we will gladly put the cat up. We are sorry to have inconvenienced you and would be happy to earn your business in the future.

name: Heather Baumbach
text: Wonderful and fast service and great craftsmanship!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience Heather. We really appreciate the feedback!

name: Garrett Stickels
text: Awesome fast customer service. Great product

resp.text: Your feedback is greatly appreciated Garrett. We are glad to hear you like our service and products. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

name: Cindy Hallman
text: James Davis and John May were my glass installers and they were friendly, professional, and they did a great job! I had three broken window panes and they were all difficult to replace, either because they were hard to get to or just big and risky. I am so relieved this is done! Thank you to everyone there at Huntsville Glass. You guys rock!

resp.text: Cindy, we are so glad to hear that our technicians did a great job. We really appreciate you taking the time to give them a review. If the need for glass does arise again we would be happy to help you!

name: Mary K Hill
text: Angie was very nice and personable on phone. Also very knowledgable. Answered all my questions quickly and easily. Give that woman a raise!

name: Blake Hargrove
text:
*** UPDATE ***
Rating - 3/5
The manager called back, apologizing for the experience we had. He seemed very sincere and wanted to earn our business, but we had already signed an agreement with a different company.

Where the individual we interacted did not show professionalism and courtesy, Huntsville Glass Company's manager did. We'll consider them for service in the future, solely based off our interaction with their manager.
******

Rating - 2/5
I'd consider giving a better review if I could actually get them to come out and provide an estimate. For 2 weeks, we've been attempting to get on their schedule. Instead, we get last minute phone calls stating that they're in the area and can stop by. If we could get maybe a 2 hour head's-up, we could accommodate Huntsville Glass' busy schedule.

Our most recent interaction ended with the individual hanging up abruptly. I suppose they're busy enough they don't need to take the time to schedule estimations with customers 2 hours in advance.

name: Lila King
text: Prompt, honest, and friendly team are experts in their field!

resp.text: We really appreciate you taking the time to give us a review Lila. Your feedback is appreciated and we are always glad to hear that our team has taken great care of our customers. If you have any future glass needs we are happy to help!

name: Stacy Tankersley
text:
I would not recommend this place.  The front desk has about the most unfriendliest, unhelpful ladies I have ever worked with.  After more than two weeks when the glass was finally ready for pickup they left a message that it was ready and for me to bring my own packing material because it will not be in any packaging there….  Really?
It also took two trips with all the measurements they ask for the glass, and I even provide pictures since it is going in an old house with no square corners.  After picking the piece up, packing it in my own material and getting it home, it did not fit.  I took the glass by Absolute Glass Service on Church and without an appointment or calling they had it cut correctly and the edges polished in five minutes for the whole sum of ten dollars.  I gave them a twenty for being so customer oriented.

name: Deirdre Taylor
text: I only go to home Depot if Lowe's doesn't have what I need, and that's rare. I always have a problem picking up orders. You can't just call in to have it brought to you by curbside because they claim to be too busy to get your information. When you go in, if the order is not in that little closet behind them, they'll just tell you it's not there rather than to go to the back and get it. I order a lot and never have a problem with Lowe's. It took an act of congress to finally get my complete order from Home Depot. One young lady, Kia went out of her way to help me and it wasn't even her department. Thanks to her I have everything. I only shop here when I absolutely have no choice.

name: Silvery Nova
text: The first problem is the delivery service company that Home Depot uses for direct deliveries,Central Transport. My 1st initial delivery date changed three time before it was actually attempted to be delivered on March 3rd. On March 3rd the shipment came on a long bed truck with a pallet dolly. My shipment is a pallet of 33 boxes of porcelain tile., plus 7 additional boxes they put on the same pallet. The right side of the pallet was coming apart due to the immense weight of the tile . The driver could not move the pallet down the truck. He was not going to be able to pull it up the small slope on my driveway. What on earth were they even thinking?They needed a fork lift. I called Home Depot and they got the Transport company on the line while I was on hold. I ended up being told the transport company needed to take care of this and they would contact me in 24 to 48 hours. Which they never did. I had to call them. On 3/5 Friday I called central transport and they told me the shipment would be delivered on Monday between 11 and 12. They never showed. I checked the shipment tracking and found that they changed it to Tuesday 3/9! I got no call, text, or phone call.So Tuesday 3/9 I message them to find out eta. They said the drivers hadn't left yet and to keep checking they will update me. That never happened. So I wait and wait and I get a call from Home Depot letting me know the tile has arrived at THE STORE. I was never told anything about this.They will be delivering the tile on Monday 3/15....

text: Online order pickup inside store was super easy. Total transaction was about 3 min. I even had someone ask me if I needed something. Unfortunately that night I was only browsing  but Thanks to the lady working in the appliances department for actually engaging.

text: Love home depot.. They had alot of stuff at decent prices and the employees were really friendly and helpful. They now have self checkout so checkout was a breeze too. It wasnt crowded and displays made things very easy to find on my own.

name: Sandra Cauley
text:
I went in the garden center and told girl at registry, that  I wanted 2 medium bags of Miracle-Gro potting soil, and help getting it n putting it in car.  No help came, then she told me go in back pick it up.  Finally realized she charged me for garden soil, I ask her to give me potting soil and charge me for the difference.  She said she couldn't, I had go customer service.  I told her I wasn't able, that why I parked out in front garden center and ask for help.  I told her I would eat the loss and never come there again.

I don't like be hard get long with, but it was her mistake, why should I have go customer service, when I have trouble walking that distance.  I will use Lowes from now on.

I'm a 100% Service Connected Disable Veteran.

text: Needed some rope but it was locked up behind glass. Could not find an employee to help. Asked the Paint Dept person to call us some assistance. Waited 10 more minutes but no one came. Hunted down someone again but they didnt know the combination to the lock that was gaurding the rope. Was in the store 30mins just for 10ft of rope!

name: melissa renee
text: The lady who sold us a washer and dryer was very nice no problems at all. I have a problem with the fact that they were supposed to be delivered at my house on April 21st. It got delayed so they moved the delivery date to Today ( April 24th ) but I never got any notification so I called and they told me that they don’t deliver to my area on saturdays, only Wednesdays and they don’t deliver when the weather is rainy. It’s been SUNNY all day. No bad weather AT ALL. Now the delivery date has been moved to May 12th. I will be giving birth in May so that’s really annoying 🙄 I ordered my washer and dryer on MARCH 3RD!!!  I hope the warehouse manager makes this right.

name: Jessie
text: Went to buy an appliance that I saw online. Called the this particular store literally on my way over there. Young lady told me that indeed they had the sale item which I was inquiring about. I get to the store and spoke with someone worker in appliances I ask him again to verify of what I wanted. He walks back and confirms my injury. Rung me up just to realize he mentioned through conversation of the appliance he thought I was asking of. Which I corrected him and pointed out and literally touched again the same appliances that I wanted. Apparently some way some how after all this confusion. They magically had sold out. So my thinking leads me to believe the person I spoke to on the phone didn't bother to check or maybe something with system either way wasted my time and here's the kicker the way the guy tried to put it was like I could go to another home depot after I already paid. Luckily my bank released this debit transaction. Poor poor salesmanship and somewhere along the line communication is lacking. I hope I can revisit this location in the future without this issue.

I actually feel bad because I lost the receipt and cannot remember her name so I could go back and submit a survey to help her employer see her worth.  If I get back there and she is there, I will make it a point to find out her name and then submit a survey for her.

Sometimes the clearance item priced stuff is phenomenal sometimes it's not a deal at all. The return warranty is a huge problem they want to make you pay a checkout fee for a broken item even if it comes back as broken and needs to be replaced they still want you to pay $35 diagnostics fee this is totally wrong on every level. I actually purchased a pressure washer could not get it to work they sent it off come back and said there was nothing wrong with it I said let's go to the garden center let's hook it up to hose and let's find out ..so finally they agreed after I insisted guess what it didn't work they still wanted $35. The extended warranty is 100% a joke it's just a way to steal money.

name: Robyn Curry
text:
**EDIT**
Since the freezer mishap below the management staff (namely Dave) has gone above and beyond to make things right by me. I feel like The Home Depot has redeemed themselves and they have earned my business once again.

I ordered an upright freezer to be delivered to my home. I missed three days of work for no-show deliveries and countless hours on the phone trying to get a freezer delivered and all I got in return was excuses and finger pointing. I had three managers from the West Mobile location involved in this situation (Dave, Cameron, and Jonathan) as well as the customer service help line. They were all aware of the fiasco that had occurred with this delivery yet when I asked what could be done no solution was offered. After a month of no freezer from the Home Depot I cancelled the order and bought one from Lowe’s. I had it the very next day. The Home Depot was always my go-to home improvement store but in light of the lack of customer service in this particular situation I think I’ll reconsider that.

name: Shaun Steffensen
text:
If you order appliances from somewhere, do yourself a favor and not order from Home Depot. First, the people who are selling the appliances do not know much about them. I was told that for installation of my microwave, I needed an outlet in the wall that it was being installed on. Great. I'm good. WRONG!!! The outlet had to be above the microwave.... Something that would have been nice to know, but they could not communicate that properly.
Then, the delivery/installation people had no idea what they were doing. They were more of a delivery company, not an installation professional. They could not install my gas range. They damaged my microwave. So, really, they weren't even a good delivery company. Home Depot just subs out delivery to the cheapest company....and you can see the quality when your damaged items arrive!
And I pray for you if you have ANY problems with your delivery or installation!!!
Count on a couple of things: 1) You will spend hours on the phone getting to talk to the right person. Once you think that you have the right person, they will tell you they have to check on something and they will have to call you back. OR, the right person is "on lunch" and they will call you back. After giving them ample time for "lunch" (3 hours) when you call them back, you will be told that they were "off today" but they will return your call in the morning.
Basically, it's a game of ping-pong and it takes days to get simple questions answered because, obviously, no one who works there wants to actually do anything.
I can't believe I dropped over $7K in there and they can't even answer a simple question!!!!
Buyer beware!!! Shop at Lowe's!!!

name: Lacey Paquin
text: I ordered $1,600 worth of appliances on black Friday to furnish my investment property. I scheduled them to be delivered on Friday, 12/22, and I was told the delivery time frame would be from 2pm-6pm. I planned accordingly and the my appliances were never delivered! No CALL or anything. It took me 4 different phone calls to reach an actual person. The delivery people could not be reached. I waited at the property until 10pm. I went to the store the next day and spoke with the manager, and apparently I was the 3rd customer complaining of no delivery and no notification. The store could not reach the delivery service because they were closed, and would not re-open again until that Tuesday after Christmas. I was told they "might" start calling customers then to attempt to re-schedule deliveries. I found this to be completely unprofessional and unacceptable. I cancelled my order and was refunded my money. I am showing my rental Wednesday and it will be empty. Home Depot has hurt my business.

text: Unfortunately I had been shopping with lowes. It had been on more than occasions than not a terrible experience. I decided to try Home Depot in my recent purchase of a bathtub. Within the first 5 minutes of being inside the store I was greeted by 4 associates. All of which were very welcoming and friendly none of which I have ever experienced at lowes. They pointed me in the direction I needed to go. Upon my arrival of the bath tub isles another associate was there eager and ready to assist me. He opened the merchandise and checked for defects and everything to my satisfaction. None of which I have ever experienced at lowes. Even on the way to check out associates asked if there was anything more they could do to help. Overall my experience at Home Depot was outstanding. I work in customer service and a lot of places lack in that department. Job well done!

name: David Patey
text: First review--- Excellent experience buying a new grill. I'm not sure if it's common, but I happen to check their website after seeing it in store, and it had a $100 off of the store price offer with curbside pick up... Um, sure !! Again, not sure that is common, but I will now certainly suggest it hence forth. And the curbside pick up went great as well. Welcome to Decatur, TSC.

resp.text: David, we appreciate you shopping with us. Thanks for the 5 star review!

name: Olivia Nolen
text: Love this store! The Decatur location delivers  amazing customer service and has knowledgeable, kind employees. My favorite store in town! Shout out to the store manager Jason, and Amanda for their exceptional service. Also the cashier, also named Olivia, was awesome!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your feedback.

name: Valerie Phelps
text: Website states they can refill propane tanks and they are open until 8pm. We head that way around 6pm with our tanks that need filled. Get there and the cashier says that they do not have anyone there to fill them. Why would a business advertise they can fill propane and not schedule an employee to actually fill them? There are not any specific times for filling posted on web site or in store. Every manager on duty should be qualified. Very disappointed ☹️

resp.text: We are so sorry for the inconvenience, Valerie! We will surely address this with the store management team. Our Customer Solutions team is available at 877-718-6750, should you need further assistance.

text: Good customer service always in stock items

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your feedback.

name: Katie Morris
text: I went to get my two puppies their shots which I could buy there and do it myself but wasn’t sure bc I had never done before. But their was this sweet girl that has worked at the Vets Office for over a year and she said if I would bring my puppies she would do it for free. She gave both my puppies their shots and they didn’t cry, whine, bite or anything! And they even gave a great after! The staff is very helpful and knowledgeable about the things I needed!!!

resp.text: Katie, thanks for the 5 star review! We appreciate your feedback. #LifeOutHere

resp.text: Nicole, we appreciate you shopping with us. Thank you for your feedback and we will share this with the team.

resp.text: Wynn, thanks for the 5 star review! We appreciate you shopping with us.

name: Michelle
text:
Extremely RUDE employees at pick up. I refuse to use this store again. It's a shame their employees act like that at a brand new store.

Apparently, they didn't believe me that I was going to call corporate when I called and asked for a manager, the woman who answered said she was the "manager". She most certainly was not and most likely the person I had the issue with. I did, in fact, call corporate and the District Manager,  Landis, called me back within the hour. He was extremely nice and addressed the issue, but I won't be returning based on this first and last visit.

resp.text: Thank you for shopping with us, Michelle! We appreciate your feedback.

name: braeden Brown
text: Went to web site to see if tractor supply could refill my camper propane tank. Web site say they refill. Went to hartselle store and was told that they did not refill at their store and referred me to the decatur store. Went to decatur store and was told by the cashier that they did not have anyone certified to refill tank . Asked if manager would be able to refill and was told that the manager was not certified to refill. Good luck with your business because I will not come back

resp.text: Braeden, we saw your feedback and would like to learn more about your experience. Please call Customer Solutions at 877-718-6750.

name: Andrew
text: From my experience, the people working here are not really all that knowledgeable about the products as they should be. Really frustrating. Really really frustrating. It was two guys who couldn’t answer basic questions. Yalls paint is too damn expensive to not be training your staff. I went to Benjamin Moore instead.

resp.text: Hi Andrew, Thank you for sharing the details of your recent experience with us and we truly apologize for the lack of customer service you received at our store. Extensive training is administered to all staff, who we hold to a very high standard. We'd like to discuss the situation with you and put you in touch with the appropriate Sherwin-Williams contact who can assist.  Please contact us at 1-800-4Sherwin (474-3794) or by email at bit.ly/2Dgu0Ti. Please include your store location, if applicable, when reaching out. Thank you and again we apologize for this situation. Sincerely, T.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

name: Chris Butera
text: I've had numerous excellent visits to this business.  The staff is professional and knowledgeable.  They are organized and willing to go the extra mile for their customers.  The store is always immaculate and the paint is worth the price.  They stand behind the product and are willing to work with you to make it perfect.  Thanks guys!

resp.text: We're glad to hear it! Thanks for sharing your positive Sherwin-Williams store experience with us. Sincerely, T.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

name: Kathy Brock
text: Friendly sales help.  Very helpful matching my colors.  Clean store.

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review of your local Sherwin-Williams store! We're glad to hear that you're pleased with our products and the service you received. Sincerely, T.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

resp.text: Hi Jeff, Thank you for sharing this feedback with us. We apologize for the inconvenience of this longer than normal wait. Providing efficient and exceptional service to all of our customers is a priority and this issue is very concerning to us. We'd like to discuss the situation with you and put you in touch with the appropriate contact who can assist.  Please contact us at 1-800-4Sherwin (474-3794) or by email at bit.ly/2Dgu0Ti. Please include the store location where this happened when you reach out. Sincerely, T.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

name: Al Rhoney
text: Every single time I've had a need to have maintenance, repair, or like today, a total replacement of my HVAC units, I've always used Mid-South Heating and Cooling. You couldn't pay me to shop for a better price. Whatever I've been charged over the years, I'm confident that the price was fair. All the technicians that I've met have been polite and professional. It feels good to have confidence that I can trust Cary and his team.

name: JP Runyon
text:
Jeremy Busby was exceptionally professional, knowledgeable, and quick to respond to making repairing our HVAC a priority!
I would highly recommend MidSouth Installers!

name: Robert Partington
text: Cary did excellent job in repairing HVAC. Very professional. Explained everything he did and why it had to be done. Gave me options on different levels of repairs or replacements. Prices were very reasonable. Very satisfied with all the work done. I will recommend him and his company to anyone that may ask for a recommendation. If I ever need HVAC service midsouth installers will be the company I call.

name: Ken Johnson
text: Knowledgeable technician and excellent service at a reasonable price.

name: Di H
text: We love this company. We have been with them for 11 years. They have come through for us when our AC was out multiple times in 96 degree temps. They just replaced 1 of our 3 old 20 year old heating and AC systems with a whole new system. When we compared to the two other replacement estimates we got from two other companies, the savings on our new system through Midsouth Installers was hundreds of dollars. They handle the seasonal maintenance for all of our systems as well. They are always prompt courteous and professional!

name: Sandy Berglund
text: We have used Midsouth for at least ten years and we have been nothing but pleased.   They are efficient and pleasant and offer to help us with ancillary work.  We highly recommend Midsouth!

name: torrie thomas
text: Damien and his crew are wonderful!!! I would recommend to any and everyone! Our AC went out on what felt like the hottest week, but we had zero worries all thanks to mid south! Damien had me intouch with Carey and in a 6-7 min phone conversation had us set up with an AC unit and all the financial steps finished with every question answered!! They quoted the prices upfront and were very kind! They came out next day and the crew, mark and Brandon, were on time, fast, and professional! Everyone was great! I can’t thank them enough!

name: Danny Niblett
text: Great place for the kids to be able to stay cool

name: Rebecca Hutchinson
text: Very knowledgeable and reliable service.

name: Timothy Wynn
text: Midsouth replaced the board on our older furnace; hoping to get a few more years out of it now. Great service!

name: Robert Hallowell
text: Best experience I’ve had with a heating and air company. Prompt and informing answers to all my questions. Their attention to the smallest details were among the reasons we decided to go forward with them and we couldn’t be happier with our decision. Very attentive to their customer’s needs. Would recommend to family, friends and to some people I don’t even like, they are that good.

name: shelly Baker
text: I'm with a local fire department and they came out and did an outstanding job. They were so professional.  When I called I was told the time that would be showing up and they were there on time. I would definitely recommend them.  We will be using them in the future for all our heating and cooling needs.

name: Darlene Stokes
text: Fast and friendly service.

name: David Evans
text: Good Service

name: Jerome Mckinstry
text: I called to get info on a home that I wanted to buy in Ga.; even though the home was not in their market the lady that answered the phone was very professional and answered my questions and advised me the best that she could under the circumstances. I wish that I could use them in Georgia.

name: Peter Bosworth
text: Great, speedy service

name: Darren Brown
text: After many years in real estate, Midsouth is the only hvac company I use on my rentals, flips and personal home.   An honest broker.  Trust Chris and Midsouth installers heating and cooling inc.,

name: Dance Dad Piper
text: I am so impressed with Midsouth Installers. Matthew was our technician and he was there to help us get our system fixed and that he did. Courteous, professional, efficient and cost effective. We will definitely use them to upgrade to a new unit in the future. This was a great experience. I see that I am one of many who are completely satisfied.

name: Frances D
text: This company was very courteous and prompt from start to finish. I had to call them for a quote regarding a full HVAC replacement and they went above and beyond. They beat everyone's quote and timeframe for completion. The guys that came out for the install displayed their professionalism from the very beginning. I will definitely refer them to my neighbors.

name: Jerimie Goike
text: Tech was on time and did the work needed on the unit.  Didn't realize how low the freon was.  He refilled the freon and now it's making the unit cycle better and the house is more comfortable without working itself to death.

name: Ali D
text: Terrible, horrible, awful would not recommend to anyone.  Only one of the three technicians they sent out were competent.  Our AC was out one month June 14 - July 15 and they repeatedly misdiagnosed what was wrong with our ac and expected us to pay for their mistakes.  We are pretty sure they broke the ac coils (we didn't have problems before they messed with it) and they re-wired our thermostat incorrectly.  I had to call constantly to get updates and no one seemed to have a clue.  Customer service is poor to say the least.  Once we FINALLY got the ac fixed they wanted to dispute the invoice.  DO NOT HIRE MIDSOUTH TO DO ANY AC WORK!

name: Cross Fire
text: Great company, honest and so easy to deal with. I choose my contractors based on their personality and how they act.  Mid South was honest from the start and they were able to get out the next day to replace my coil.  I had several questions for the company who originally installed my 4 year old central AC unit (3D) and they dodged me like the plague which says so much about their business. Mid South was completely honest, very personable, friendly  and I could go on.  If you need hvac help call Mid South and don't waste your time with anyone else.

name: Brian Gullage
text:
$616............for 2 twenty dollar capacitors and a 15 minute service call.  So my previous 5 star review has changed.

I have been a very loyal customer of Midsouth, and I have recommended them to numerous people. I have always given them excellent reviews.

I know small businesses have high expenses and need to make a profit, but overcharging a loyal customer that sends you referrals has consequences.

resp.text:
Hello Mr Gullage,
I hope you are doing well. I just wanted to make a quick response to your negative feedback. We actually charged you 485.00 for (2) pounds of Freon and (2) capacitors. This is a very competitive price in our area for the service that was performed on your HVAC system.

We always give upfront pricing before any work is completed. You had the option to approve or decline the work  before any work was performed on your system. You approved the work order and then we made the needed repairs. Please feel free to reach out to us if you have any more questions or concerns. You can contact our office @ (205)730-1270. As always, we appreciate your business!!!

We do our very best to stay as competitive as possible to help our customers.

text:
Midsourh workers came out on Friday night and successfully got our air COOLING!!! They were knowledgeable and extremely courteous and gave us an estimate for the cost before
doing the job. We are pleased with their service and are happy to recommend them.

text: Nice people and they have overnight parking for big rigs that are needing to deliver in the morning, Which is great to see.

text: Quick to get you loaded. And very nice

name: A. Hollis
text: I love to go here for all my home improvement needs, I would have given 5 stars but for the lack of associates being available for assistance and the extreme price for wood.I had to note that. Covid has made some places lose workers, maybe it will pick back up soon and the price hike on wood is ridiculous but it is everywhere you go. Customers shouldn't have to pay for all the lost business, we suffered too. Lattice $70 Lowes has always been pricier than Home Depot anyway, I guess you pay for that extra service.

name: Brannon Herzing
text: Good job. It's not like these are cheap. Why would you put this box under the other boxes I have?

name: J Martin
text: I'm not exactly sure what the deal is with this place. The lady in hardware is especially nice and knowledgeable. It's just hard to find anyone. No one seems to know where anything is, the lumber saw was broken, and just seems generally under staffed. Once I went in needing help finding a specific fitting for a pipe. There was a group of men standing there talking, and I couldn't really get any of them to help. I went to the customer service desk and waited for a page for about 10 mins. I just left. That was the first time that happened. Usually if you can find someone, they're extremely nice and helpful, but you have to hunt for them. Another time a fellow customer ended up explaining the tools I needed and where to find them because there was no one to be found. I don't really leave bad reviews, but this store needs more employees it seems like. And some serious help.

name: Michael Perry
text:
Like Home Depot - it is very extremely hard to get good assistance from store associates.  They are few and far between.  If or when you do finally get some assistance - they are extremely untrained for an area that they are not assigned to.

All associates should be highly trained in all areas of the store.  And there should be more associates to assist customers.

name: Jimmy Melvin
text: The customer service is usually on point. The only reason for the 3 stars is this location is consistently out of basic materials needed for electrical work. There have been several times I’ve had to actually look on the top shelf at overstock to find what I need if it’s even there. The store however is kept clean and aisles clear.

name: Samantha Wiley
text: Why does your website guarantee satisfaction within thirty days of a paint purchase and claim I can exchange it or get money back? I was just told by the paint desk and customer service your company does not do that. They said people come in showing the website all the time but never do it.

name: jenn0810
text: Nobody cares about customer service any more. Can’t even get someone to check out a 75 year old veteran when there are several people with their aprons on standing around talking to one another. No reason to tell someone to check themselves out and you getting paid to stand there. Absolutely ridiculous.

name: Fitzgerald Hampton
text: Had a bathroom project I was doing I needed a small havksaw and extra blades.  I found everything with no problem made the purchase and left the store. Had no customer associate interaction whatsoever. Which goes back to me saying that Lowe's has very limited amount of associates working throughout the day in each department and they don't have anyone to help customers when needed.

name: Valrie Niblett
text: Lots of parking easy entry and exit handicapped accessibility clean clean restrooms helpful employees I went to look at plants they had a large variety I was pleased at the prices of what I bought.I went inside and found a plant to put in a seashell I had brought home from the beach that was a surprise.I noticed they had everything to turn your outdoors into your own oasis.Grills canopies plants furniture firepits torches and so much more.Happy hunting always check your local stores website for great deals

name: Billy Hughes
text: While exceptionally stocked, what I needed was not in stock. Still love building supply stores.

text: Today was 🌞,all the flowers and plants displays were vivid. Ppl like being outdoors gardening. Lowe's is great for gathering 👍 supplies that will help in the diy tasks around your yard.

name: Mega Boombox
text: I walked in this store to buy only 1 item. There was a store employee right at the front door stocking shelves and I asked for help. He stopped what he was doing and located my item . Now my item was on a shelf 25 feet up . He located a lift to get my 1 item . My shopping was finished in 5 minutes. Store was clean and employees very helpful. I will return.

text: Went in with out a mask and got everything I need without a hassle. Even got hassle free help finding a few items. Real friendly folks

Multiple installers out, lol, how bout they don't have all of items needed. Go to store, Multiple times because I can't get anyone on phone to help, only to see employees doing nothing, probably why no assistance on the phone. Same manager(Donovan) walking around not managing and still no install. Thanks for the horrible experience of shopping. Smh...we have to get someone who knows what value is...them folks in there...nvm

name: Camron Morgan
text: Can't get anyone to help or answer a phone. Had items delivered to my house and they are busted up. Usually pretty understanding of these things but this is by far some of the worst service I have ever experienced. After a late order and being told they would deliver on another day of my choice it still comes on a different day and multiple items broken. I cannot suggest using this location for any delivery purposes.

name: Gregory Tremble Jr
text: My #1 Home 🏡 Renovations Location Lowe's n Fultondale, Al n Appreciate The Excellent Services As Always. 💯

Plus Garage Door Opener and all Yard Tools...they gave me a Tremendous Buy for it ALL!! THANKS LOWES HOME IMPROVEMENTS...I WILL BE BACK!! 😊

name: Kilroy 5150
text: They seem to be genuinely nice people. But it always seems as if there is more demand than they have people to cover.

name: Tremaine Sudduth
text: I’ve never had this problem before but my family and I were in the garden section at Lowe’s in Fultondale. We were the only 3 in that section and we heard over the intercom customer service needed in the garden section. We haven’t pressed any button to call for help or anything. Next thing we see like 3 Lowe’s employees walking around watching us like we were trying to steal freaking plants! They literally followed us until we went to self checkout. Then more started gathering around watching while we were checking out. I feel like they were racial profiling by sending that many employees to follow us and I felt very uncomfortable

name: Kevron Jimerson
text: Great selection, but related items are not located together. Example: Faucets are in one area while washer assortment kit is located near the front of the store.

name: Tracie Brasher
text: Price clearly stated above product but product range up wrong  manager said price has to be on actual product for him to give it for that price. Nothing in the store has price on actual product hardly. Spent over an hour and still unresolved.

name: C Tuck
text:
If I could give zero stars I would!

So, in 2017, We had Lowe’s install new gutters with gutter guards (at their suggestion). We noticed that our roof above our front door has started to leak even more now, so we called our insurance about it. They checked it out, confirmed there was damage. Referred someone who could get the job done. Simple, claim stuff. The guy who is replacing our roof observed that the gutters were actually installed wrong and are causing water to sit on my roof AND rotting the wood underneath the shingles. LOWES will not do anything about it because of when they were installed and because they went through a contractor. SMH. Wish I’d known that before I bought all my bathroom remodeling supplies from them, I will no longer buy from Lowe’s. They have installed carpet in my house, through contractors before, I never thought I would have to go behind them and check accuracy and quality! I have my living room and kitchen that I am gettin ready to remodel, sadly I’ll have to shop elsewhere! I am a very DISAPPOINTED customer!

name: Catherine Owens
text: Best customer service I have received in a long time.

name: Ray Blackwell
text:
Didn't have what I was looking for.
Got something else instead.
Place was busy as all get out.
But plenty of people working in the store. They made a suggestion for a different item. Make a purchase on it.
Hope it's close to the same thing.

name: Jim Anderson
text:
Called before I drove 40 minutes to see if they had what I was looking for, Waited on hold for over 30 minutes trying to get someone to pick up the phone in the appliance department, never did pickup.
The Operator that I dealt with was very rude  and proceeded to tell me it was not her job to do anything but answer the phone.
Finally drove 40 minutes to the store and they did not have what I needed,it would have been very nice to have known that before I went.
I mean seriously I will try and never do business with these people again.

name: James Rice
text: I am continuously calling about a questions about a problem with my appliance delivery.  This is my 10th call today and NOBODY ANSWERS the phone in any department.  When someone did answer, I was placed on hold and then the phone dropped.  In fact, I have just been transferred by the 2nd person who answered and still, nobody will pick up the phone and my call was just dropped once again. What is going on here?   Very unprofessional.  Back to Home Depot.  Will try not to use Lowes and certainly not Fultondale ever again.

name: Sky G
text: I am a huge fan of Lowes as a whole, and typically have pleasant dealings in their storefronts.  I recommend you stay away from this location if you desire any sort of customer service assistance.  It is dismal to say the least. Maybe 1 in 20 employees understands what it takes to work in retail.

You may want to work on that Lowes!!

Gave color needed and.finised shopping. Picked up paint , not realizing she left set paint on side of can. What a mess, didn't notice the paint, she should have. Found all but one. Unfortunately help was as elusive as the plant was. Shree was our checkout person and she was very sweet and was only one working.  We purchased an item that she placed in a bag and I forgot to ask for it and Shree forgot to get it off the round.
Still a lovely day to go plant shopping.

The competition has a similar item, but is different in size. There will be a visible break, but can't be avoided. Sorry Lowes, thought I could depend on you.

Lowe’s needs to learn a few things from them. I still never got hold of anyone. I’m trying to find status of appliance order done a few mths ago. Sad the store has gone down hill lately.

text: Don't keep it stocked. Rude employees. Very disappointed.

name: Joe Smith
text:
Can’t ever get anyone to answer the phone. Lowe’s website tells you to call to confirm if an item is in stock, what a joke! They operate without care because they are the only game in town. We need a Home Depot in north Birmingham. This is not a reflection of the employees. It is a reflection of the store manager. He exceeds store financial objectives purely because locals have no other choice. Competition would be a game changer!

I will continue to drive to Trussville Home Depot where customer service is first class.

name: Leslie Calvert
text: While i love my tree it's a little pricey this year for real for a 6 foot tree this close to Christmas

text: The person who helped me load my fertilizer acted like it was a burden. Although it was his job. That's not a good experience for a costumer.

text: There is never an associate to be found to help you.  And if you have them call for one it takes 10 minutes for someone to show up.

text: Not great BUT not bad either. Only 1 out of the 6 employees I encountered spoke to me and actually "attempted" to help and by help I mean: "Um I'm pretty sure that's on aisle 2.", and then walked away. Just need to be more customer focused, there is always time to put up merchandise.

text: Staff is very nice and helpful. Prices could be better.

name: Jacob Heidkamp
text: Not following mask mandate. Every time the employee helping me spoke he pulled his mask off. No reason. Don't go in person. They are not being responsible or safe.

name: Toby Joiner
text: There is never an associate to be found to help you.  And if you have them call for one it takes 10 minutes for someone to show up.

name: Jonathan Bates
text: It's close to the house and sells lumber!!!  A bit shy on knowledgeable staff, or staff in general.  Seems to rely on vendors to show customers anything. They had several extremely knowledgeable employees a few years ago, but they also had cashiers too then....  Nothing says thanks for spending hard earned money here like shoving it into a black box after you had to scan and bag your own stuff....

name: Jacob Heidkamp
text: Not following mask mandate. Every time the employee helping me spoke he pulled his mask off. No reason. Don't go in person. They are not being responsible or safe.

name: tom Phillips
text: I was very disappointed in seeing face masks not being worn by more than several customers and no store representatives enforcing the requirement.  I also saw several employees not covering their nose with their mask and others with no mask at all such as the cashier in lumber.   It is time for the adults in the room to step up and do the right thing!

name: Wayne
text: I know what I need when I come here. For the most part I know where to go to find it. When something is out of stock or it hadn't been restocked yet surely the employee working in the areas should know their areas well enough to know how to find it's temporary location or if it has been reordered within a reasonable amount of time without having to find several others just to ask how to find it. I could of done it myself on their website on my phone. So what is their presence for?  I'm all for jobs but paying someone to just work there only drives the cost up to customers.

name: Kacey Cottingham
text: Nice employees found what I needed..👍

text: As always Lowe's bail me out. They had what I needed and at a reasonable price. Sure hate they moved from Graysville

text: Absolutely better than Home Depot.

text: Great experience all around.

name: Heather Mcdaniel
text:
Whoever answers the phone for flooring is unbelievably rude. They are very short and crude. Whether or not you are having a bad day you don’t bring that to work. We had someone come out and take measurements of our floors to get a quote on how much it would cost to do our floors. The guy who took the measurements said we would hear something the next day. It’s been a week and they still  don’t have the information.

I find that hard to believe.

text: Best place for home improvements equipment!!!

Short on help.  40 members short of full staff.
Can't  supply adequate service.

name: Corky Reed
text: Hailey at the Fultondale Lowes was friendly and helpful. People like her makes shopping there a pleasure.

name: THE ONE THEY CALL WISE
text: Davids dangerous work place. Store manager had complete disregard for safety involving forklifts and order pickers. US EMPLOYEES WANNA LIVE!!

name: Jimmie Thomas
text: Great place to get building supplies

name: Tammy D
text: A worker there had a attitude did not like her, I got some paint, was very rude,  left paint on the can, didn't wipe the can off it got on the cashier hand, she best be glad it didnt get on me, if she didnt want to be there she should have stayed at home, 🤨

name: Constance Watkins
text:
I paid for an upright freezer on 7/15/20. While in the store the clerk stated that they had 1 more left and that it could be delivered the next day.  I  waited from 8am to 8pm for the appliance.  When I finally got someone,  the appliance was not on the truck or in the store.
I was then told that it was ordered.   2 weeks  later another delivery day was set up.   By the end of the day, no freezer.      A month later received  a call and text message for next day delivery.   Again, no delivery.  By the forth call and text which was on a Sunday,  I  called the store and .o one would answer the phone.   Later that evening when I did get someone, still no product.    I called  the corporate office and complained.   I never got a call to apologize for my inconvenience. I spoke with the corporate office about getting my money back and was told the store could do it over the phone.   When I called and finally got someone to answer the phone. I  was told that I had to come in. When I got there, the clerk said they could not give me the money for the warranty.   At that point I  demanded  my money and the manager
The clerk walked off and someone else came and told me the manager was in a training meeting.  Considering All That I'd been through,  the manager should have come out.  He was the only one that could authorize the refund.   It took 2. Weeks to get my money credited back to my card.  I will never go to Lowes in GARDENDALE ever again
The service was horrible and management a joke.  If you are handicap this is not the store to go to.  90 days of lies and he'll is what I got.  Considering that the merchandise was paid for and my account FLAGGED TO give a phone call on updates, I received NOTHING.
VERY POOOOOR SERVICE.

name: Meredith Burgett
text: Went in to purchase wood for a bedroom and the sales associate was super helpful and made it a flawless process.

name: Leann Talley
text: If I could give no stars I would. Supposed to have a Refrigerator delivered on 4-22-2020, they called said the truck was down ok that’s fine was told I would get it the next day. I had to go to the store to find out what was going on because the can’t bother to answer phones was told I couldn’t get it till Sunday. Told them to give me my money back it was processed then they tell me it will take 7 days for my money to be back. NEVER AGAIN WILL I BUY ANYTHING FROM THERE

name: Pat Lively
text: One check out person at 1:15 on a Saturday with about 14 people in line. Self  check out wasn't any better. Several people just got out of line and left.

name: Elizabeth G Stratton
text: Please never go to this Lowe’s. We’ve ordered carpet and storm door from them and both times they messed up our order. They also would not fix their mistake. Worst customer service ever.

name: Leonard Kitchin
text: I shop at Lowes often, the draw back I have is they don't stock enough products in backstock and I have to go to Homedepot.

name: Larry Brown
text: Great Selection!

name: Kayla Nash
text: I ordered a curbside pickup. Yes it says to wait till an email is sent to pick it up but I was already  nearby, so I decided to wait. In the hour and a half I sat here.... 1 person was brought their pickup. If I saw more activity, I would understand but 1 in an hour and a half!!!

name: Ziggy Z
text: Great variety, great customer service, neat and clean.. They have a lovely assortment of plants and flowers

name: Stephen Brown
text:
I like this lowes. They have a great selection and they're conveniently located. Only problem is they almost ALWAYS have everything Kobalt up in top stock. And with the exception of 1 or 2 people, no one seems interested in looking for it. They just say "we don't have it". So I routinely go and find it myself, and ensure I go back to the same employee that didn't want to work, and tell them I found it for them. The look on their face is always amusing.

Other than never having their HOUSE brand actually on the shelf, I enjoy shopping here.

name: Jesus Tejeda
text: I was going to buy 2x10x12 pressure treated wood and needed to have it cut in half but they said since it was treated wood they couldn’t cut it cuz it messed up they saw and they didn’t have a special blade to cut treated wood lol, really i guess they need to call home depot to see if they sell blades for pressure treated wood...

name: Lucretia McCarter
text: Found the flowers that I was looking for to plant. Very nice customer service!

name: Joe Glazier
text:
Have to say I wS pretty disappointed on this trip.  This store has gone way downhill in the past few months.  I went to the lumber department to price wood for a project. A full third of the bins were empty.  The sad thing is that what they did hqve out was in the wrong place!  2x6x10 where the 4x6x12 should have been.  All of it was like this.  It was impossible to tell what the price was on anything!

Throughout the store, asiles were blocked by pallet jacks or buggies, making navigation difficult at best.  To think I drove nearly an hour just to go here....

name: Joshua Dendy
text: A handful of good people overshadow the plethora of awful ones.

name: Jan Mooney
text: Didn't have the size light bulbs, a small part to fix my lamp and not the size filters for my furnace. Very disappointed.

name: Therese O'Hara
text: Worker helped us right away when he saw us looking around

name: Courtney Lawson
text: Slowest company!!!!!! Curbside here is a joke. Took 40 mins.... 🙈🙈🙈

name: Layneigha Kinnaird
text: Joined the Pros Services and very first order was damaged by delivery driver as well as damage to my property.  Buyer beware because Lowe's corporate has not been easy or pleasant to deal with on the damage claim.  Closing my Pros account and will be shopping at Home Depot.

name: Lazlow Wandschneider
text: I like Lowe's a lot. If you are going to shop there often get a Lowe's card and you get 5% off every time you buy anything. 10% off on special weekends. Pay it off every month and it's like free money.

name: Lara Polk
text: They have all kinds of stuff. Unfortunately this day it was one of those days to stand in line they didn't have much help. I'm sure we'll be back though.
